events.title: How To Unleash Your Inner Slut
events.description:
A ʺslutʺ means being able to fully honor your innermost desires. Sometimes it takes a few days to drop into one’s flow-state and feel like your unrestrained self. Come join us for a personal accelerator into claiming the fun-loving slut of delight that you truly are and make the most of every minute here at BM. In this two part playshop, Erin will open you up with a series of yummy stretches so that your unmasked self can be shared with others. Then Booster will lead the group through group games and interactions designed to unleash your inner slut energy in a safe and positive way! This is a non-sexual event.

Get out of your own way. Shed the default world completely behind and open up to the rich world waiting for you here!

events.title: Afternoon Coffee
events.description:
Need an afternoon PICK-ME-UP?                                                                              A little energy before another night on the Playa?


Roasted Breaux & Coffee Heaux Coffee Camp will be open on Monday, Wednesday and Thursday from 1-3 PM. Bring family, friends, lovers and strangers and create your own unique blend from our wide range of International coffees.  You have the opportunity to hand-grind you own unique selection of coffee that will be served pour-over style. Then pull up a chair or a pillow and sit, relax, listen to music and visit with friends, new and old, in our coffee house lounge.

We will be roasting our coffee at various times throughout the week so you won’t find a fresher cup of coffee in BRC. Come in, hang out and if you feel up to it, join in and help us roast our next batch of Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux coffee.  

Ask about coming by and roasting your own on-the-playa beans to bring back to the default world (a little playa dust in the mix makes a great brew!) or help us gift a fresh cup of coffee to the burners who are serving the BRC community.

In the LNT (Leave No Trace) spirit, please remember to bring your own cup, or subject yourself to the “Wheel of Misfortune” (cue the sinister music)!!!

Among this year’s host camps are Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Duckpond, Cubhouse, BAAAHS, and Celestial Bodies. The ride culminates with an 80s Jazzercise Dayglo afterparty hosted by the wonderful folks at Comfort & Joy. If you’re willing to meet the dress code, join us for one of the goofiest parties on the playa. No statement or political agenda; just riding our bikes, drinking some cocktails, and making new friends. Oh yeah, and we’re naked. Mugs for the first 500 riders (and yeah, we always run out). events.title: Lifestyle Perfected Passion Experience
events.description:
"In this fun and enlivening workshop, you will learn a new context for passion and how to consistently live in a passionate state. Imagine living your life where you are spending the majority of your time doing what you love? Feeling alive and excited about waking up in the morning to experience the day. What would that be like for you? 

Through this workshop you will create a step by step process to:
Understand a new context for passion
Get a clear picture of your passions and what you love to do
Create the steps and room in your life to do things you are passionate about
Share your passions with others to build a community of likeminded people
See an increase in happiness and living a life you love

Half the moves are with your partner, half with everyone else, resulting in a tribal vibe, where the Zen is flow, synchrony, and bonding (not footwork, not competition). If you are smiling, you are doing it right. Kid friendly. Possible for many disabled. No need to bring your own partner. Everyone who shows up should have a good time

We'll show you how and you'll leave with a crystal of your own, supplies permitting. Mon-Fri 2-3pm  Dark Wednesday.

events.description: Party Naked Tiki Bar is a clothing optional bar returning to the Playa for our seventh year to provide “Tiki Punch” libations to thirsty Black Rock City citizens 21 and over. You must be 21 or over to Party here and we do ask for and check ID's (it's always good to carry your ID while at Burning Man). We start to dispense our "Tiki Punch" (yes, it has a punch) at 11:00am daily. Nudity is never required but at Party Naked Tiki Bar it is rewarded. This year we have 800 commemorative leis to give to citizens that "do it" (get naked). Make sure to come by early and get lei'd. We promote a no pressure relaxed atmosphere where you can get naked or not. Nude is not lewd so uninvited or inappropriate touching is prohibited. events.title: Instinctive Song Vocal Improvisation
events.description:
Come try some basic structures to vocal improvisation, explore your creativity through music, build confidence with your voice, and co-create original songs. Using movement and the body as our starting point, we will jam, make sounds, and create music as a group. This work has been incredibly fun, healing, and musically enriching for me and I'm thrilled to be sharing it.

About Natasha:

I'm a musician, facilitator and social artist who works within the Creative Communities Model. I've studied with vocal improvisors Rhiannon (Hilo, Hawaii) and Bisia Belina (Victoria, BC) and give workshops in my home community of Yellowknife, NT, Canada.
events.print_description: Explore creativity, connection and musicality through spontaneous, improvised vocal music. Experienced and shy singers welcome!

events.title: Pinhole Camera Photography with Pinhole Project
events.description:
Come check out our pinhole camera and play with us, we do pinhole photography! Pinhole Project has brought to the playa twelve very large pinhole cameras created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. Join us in our annual pilgrimage to use old school pinhole photography on the playa.

The Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject. We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa. The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999.
events.print_description: Come play with us, we do pinhole photography on the playa!

events.title: Start your own town!
events.description: It sometime seems as if things are grim and change could just never come about in the places where we live. With extreme divide in our government, a broken food system and environmental degradation continuously getting worse, what can we possibly do to change things? I say, start an ecological community with all of your favorite people in the most ideal climate where conscious choice and intentional design are integral to your decision making. I will guide you on my journey in Costa Rica in creating community on a crystal clear river with deep pools where dripping fruit trees line the roads and neighbors care about each other and are dedicated to improving our world.
events.print_description: Step by step on how to make the community of your dreams a reality!  several communities in Costa Rica!!

events.title: Calm Inside

Calm Inside is designed to let you center your day, before all the hub bub and commotion...thumps thumps and sirens...the inescapable thrills of mayhem and delight. The Live Music will be of a more ambient, soul-filling, relaxation...happiness genre....so come and be at peace!!! After Calm Inside, enjoy our very popular Live Music Yoga in the Morning…where music meets the pose! On Wednesday and Friday, a portion of Calm Inside will include guided meditation.

events.title: Blues and Partnered Dance Before Noon
events.description:
Have you seen how partnered dancers seem to have amazing connection and almost psychic communication with one another? How they move together with the music so perfectly? Want to learn how to speak that language? Join us for a beautiful encounter with partnered dance at Reverbia and dance under our Radience Dome. .

We'll be showing you how to listen to the music and find the rhythm that unites you and the dust with the world. Then we'll be giving you some simple tips to express it in your own movement so you can connect with any partner. Stick around for live music and dancing afterward with the California Honey Drops!

events.title: Elephant Expressions
events.description:
A ten part, ten year art project based on the Ten Principles of Burning Man.  This year, in name of "Radical Self Expression" we sent out five hundred vinyl toy elephants to kids all over the world and asked them to express themselves by decorating them.  We are then taking those elephants and displaying them at Burning Man under The Man as part of the Guild Workshops piazza.
Our aim is to bring awareness of the importance of creativity in a child's life. Lack of funding has stopped art programs in many public schools across the country. We are figuratively and literally putting the crayon back in the child's hand. We are also bringing 10,000 elephants to the playa this year and letting burners express themselves by decorating the elephants, and gifting them to fellow burners. 
We chose to create a vinyl elephant for the kids to decorate because of the elephant's outstanding memory. We are building positive experiences in children that we want them to remember for a lifetime. 
We also sculpted the elephant into the shape of the Vitruvian Man, as a wink to this year's Burning Man theme.
events.print_description: Radical Self Expression, 10,000 Elephants to decorate, gift, take home and get creative with. Come visit us under the man and Express yourself.

events.title: Tribal Tantra Heart Opening Puja
events.description:
You are invited to this Heart Opening Tantra Puja. A Puja is a devotional offering. Through this sacred ceremony we can realize of the true nature of the Self and experience into the state of total oneness.
 
 This Tantra Puja is a way of honoring and adoring the divine that dwells within each of us. 
 
 What is a Heart Opening Puja? Watch here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=osqSdVTIZ_4
 
 This is a "station" puja. There is an inner and outer circle. One rotates and with each rotation you have a new partner. Each partnering is an opportunity to fall in love with ourselves through the eyes of another.
 
 The stations are subtle, elegantly simple and this is their potency. The tantric arts invite us into our own heart in an ease full way. One of the most exquisite is this ceremony where we open to an embodied experience of witnessing the divine in all and thus the diving in ourselves.
 
 Open to the possibility of adoration, forgiveness, unconditional love and experiencing your true and higher self in the span of a few short hours.
events.print_description: Rotational Circle Puja. Fall in love with self by falling in love with others one partner at a time. Profound experience of oneness and healing.

events.title: Poly High Tea
events.description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.
events.print_description: Facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed about Polyamoury and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

Three years straight of our famous Apple Pie Moonshine has left people coming back for more, and waking up cross eyed. Just the right sweetness and as smooth as a freshly shaved vagina, you can just call it the dessert for the desert. And we will be rocking the camp with some old school metal, so come join us!

events.title: Wild & Risky Cocktail Saloon & Casino Lounge
events.description:
Pop into the Bang Bang Wild Saloon Cocktail Lounge & Casino. Stroll through on your way out to The Playa, pop in on your way home from a sunrise session. Or Start the day fresh here. Be prepared to enter and RISK something, for every RISK, there is potential REWARD. What to RISK? Something tangible. Something creative. Something material. Something you are prepared to RISK. You decide!

Bigger the RISK leads to Bigger REWARD. Leave a shoe, leave a trinket, leave your pants, leave a love note, leave a bike, leave a song lyric, leave a dance, leave your glasses or leave Burner Fashion. Place it in the secret drawers and Bang Bang's Casino will decide the outcome.

Our giant Casino Games can help you win YOUR item back, or RISK the chance to win something more shiny, However chance loosing it all and see that item be gifted forward to others.

Once you play the Bang Bang Casino Games you drink all day at the Bang Bang Cocktail Bar. Every day a delightful cocktail is curated for your taste buds, there will be music playing at ambient levels to give the saloon atmosphere.

Casino Games: Aussie Two Up, Giant Dice, Human Roulette, Bingo Blitz & Giant Cards

Care not to risk something tangible? No worries mate, you can drink at the bar, everyone is welcome. BUT for every drink you feel like knocking back requires the Non-Riskers to have a spoonful of vegemite... or just harden up and TAKE A RISK, you only live once!

events.title: Wild & Risky Cocktail Saloon & Casino Lounge
events.description:
Pop into the Bang Bang Wild Saloon Cocktail Lounge & Casino. Stroll through on your way out to The Playa, pop in on your way home from a sunrise session. Or Start the day fresh here. Be prepared to enter and RISK something, for every RISK, there is potential REWARD. What to RISK? Something tangible. Something creative. Something material. Something you are prepared to RISK. You decide!

Bigger the RISK leads to Bigger REWARD. Leave a shoe, leave a trinket, leave your pants, leave a love note, leave a bike, leave a song lyric, leave a dance, leave your glasses or leave Burner Fashion. Place it in the secret drawers and Bang Bang's Casino will decide the outcome.

Our giant Casino Games can help you win YOUR item back, or RISK the chance to win something more shiny, However chance loosing it all and see that item be gifted forward to others.

Once you play the Bang Bang Casino Games you drink all day at the Bang Bang Cocktail Bar. Every day a delightful cocktail is curated for your taste buds, there will be music playing at ambient levels to give the saloon atmosphere.

Casino Games: Aussie Two Up, Giant Dice, Human Roulette, Bingo Blitz & Giant Cards

Care not to risk something tangible? No worries mate, you can drink at the bar, everyone is welcome. BUT for every drink you feel like knocking back requires the Non-Riskers to have a spoonful of vegemite... or just harden up and TAKE A RISK, you only live once!
events.print_description: Dare to risk something tangible. Bigger the risk, bigger the reward. Once you play drink all day. Have a punt a with large Casino games & Cocktails.

events.title: Cathartic Relief: Laughing out Trauma
events.description:
"In this experiential workshop I will cover the essential contraction chain reaction within the human structure, simple nervous system theory, stress release through catharsis and practical methods to use body work, humor and presence to help facilitate in yourself and another how to release.
 After a Short intro and energizer we will dive into opening our bodies back up to joyful living.
 Walk away with new tools to use with yourself in stress, to use with others in your body work sessions."
events.print_description: Simple way to release your body of Old Stuck Stuff! Powerful use of laughter and body work. Self Induced and Partnered work. Freedom!

If you to sing Mo' Mercy Karaoke, talented singers stand by on 3 additional mics to jump in and sing the song with you to makes sure the 6:00 Plaza is filled only with the most beautiful sounds of song. Ambitious singers can opt for No Mercy Karaoke, where they sing solo or duet and a panel of judges will either award them a prize for a beautiful song or CUT THEIR MIC and fade back to dance music if anything less. Oh yes, it can get brutal, but it's all love and fun on the playa!

events.title: Bucky Dome Open House
events.description: Check out this new method of dome construction that sets up in under an hour. Requires no tools, special skills, or strength to assemble. Using the geometry of the truncated icosahedron, aka Bucky Ball, this dome frame features uniform pole lengths, isometric vertices, and a modified tensegrity system to stabilize and distribute loads. 15’-25’ diameter domes can be erected by only two people.

See how to be the stable foundation for the next generation. Strengthen your Archetypes and watch as your life, and women, rise to meet you.

Its time to run the race, stand up and demonstrate the drive to be a leader, a king, a warrior, a great lover, a father and brother to many."

events.title: ACTOROKE at Camp Baggage Check'
events.description:
Actoroke is “Karaoke for actors.” In Karaoke you would pick a song to sing in front of your friends and strangers. In Actoroke, you and a friend pick a scene from a popular movie to act out. We will have a full film crew setup, complete with 3 cameras (wide master, and one on each actor), wireless lapel mics for each actor, 2 teleprompters (one for each actor, in their eye line), and a truss and lighting setup.

You will be directed by our camp’s filmmaker, Hoss Hitchcock, who will help you through your performance. Come get the full experience of acting and being directed.

The video feeds from all three cameras will be displayed in the “video village” where your friends and strangers can watch your performance!

If this sounds fun but you don’t want to act, then try your hand at running a camera or teleprompter!

Wed & Fri 10:00 pm to late

events.title: Oppression and Intimacy: Renaissance Relationships
events.description:
Liberating Ourselves from Patriarchy, Racism, and Heteronormativity in our Relationships On and Off Playa -
Come! Dive into how oppression affects your most intimate and interpersonal dynamics as well as the fantasies running through your own head. This will be a safer space to explore how oppression plays out in your relationships and in your own desires. You will gain tips and tools for how to liberate your mind and how to creatively and sexily shift cultural narratives that don't serve you. This workshop is for people of all backgrounds and genders from kinksters to vanillas, sexperts to just beginning to explore, queer to straight, poly folks to monogamous folks, partnered to single, and all that's in between - everyone is welcome!

events.title: SCOTCHFEST
events.description: Yo, Mukker!! Still kickin’ y’self for missing last year, eh...? 100 bottles of single malt on the bar and you weren’t there!? Like a nightmare you can’t wake from. Except, you CAN... ‘Cause we’re doin’ it again! That’s right, Scotchfest is back -- your basic confluence of peat, dust, and obsessed freaks like you! The rules are simpler than golf, so pay attention... Bring a bottle of your favorite drop to the Mystikal Misfits bar (4:30 & B) at 2 pm, Wednesday, August 31st. MALT FESTIVAL, jocko – exotic, unique, transcendent -- and we’re looking to learn what YOU like. In return, every other souser presents a bottle of their best game, so make no other plans until 6 pm. Be prepared for Scottish music, savory nibbles, and a superlative group of like-minded Burner scotch freaks! They don’t do this kind of thing where you live, boyo, so mark it down. And remember, it’s an exclusive event -- NO BOTTLE, NO ENTRY. So, if you’re tromping through the desert stour spewing feathers like a twally, know that Lassie or Laddie, skuddy roaster or minted dobber, we’ll be gettin’ belter blootered at the Misfits, mate... If you ain’t geein it yaldy, hell slap it intae ye! And as we’re fond of saying, “A dram good time will be had by all!”
events.print_description: Join for a once-a-year massive tasting featuring over 100 bottles with like-minded fans. Entry requires a bottle of single malt (No blends) Sláinte!

events.title: Cock Talk & Yoni Verse. A Sharing Time
events.description:
"He's so fit, I bet he has such high confidence...
 She's so skinny, she must never be lonely...
 Oh I'm too....blah... I'll never be... blah
 CALLING BULLSHIT
 Sexy, ugly, Hung, small, Fit, fat, big nose, weird toes.... ugh! Enough!
 All these descriptions leave their Scars. Want to drop that stone?
 We all have fears of social rejection based on external appearance.
 Some contracted crappy idea that to in order to get love I have to look a certain way, be a certain somebody, or they wont accept me.
 This space is for sharing those deep painful truths
 The big kid in school may get bullied outright, but the pretty kid is also cursed, they can never express their self consciousness, their insecurity, their fears and alone feelings, ""its not allowed""
 Well FUCK THAT
 Here, You Are Allowed. All of You. Welcome your doubts, welcome your pride, welcome welcome welcome to your blessed body."

events.title: Bridges to Another Life
events.description:
"Exponentially accelerating technology, population and development imply that the vast majority of all technological progress has occurred within living memory, yet the basic template for industrial civilization hasn't changed much since Hiroshima.  Merely tacking organic food and  iPhone apps onto the suburban consumerism of the fifties sells both humanity and technology short.  Rather than leaping into the unknown however, or embracing an interested vision, most people rightly stock with what they know, even as it ceases to inspire, or even to make sense.  

Experimental communities can showcase the possibilities technology and abundance have made available, preparing the disaffected to make a shift from consumerism to more advanced forms of society. "
events.print_description: Reconciling the demands faced by businesses and communities enables us to disseminate cultures appropriate to current conditions.

Come dressed as your favorite character, be it princess or mermaid, tea pot or beast, and get ready to feel like a kid again!

events.title: The Orgasamator Experience
events.description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private. Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.

events.title: Porn & Donuts

What's better than a deliciously decadent donut? How about a side of hot porn? Movies start screening at about 10pm. Hot hand crafted donuts are fresh off the fryers by midnight. 

Porn and Donuts was started in 2011. Our mission at PND is to serve deliciously decadent doughnut delights to as many dusty hungry burners as we possibly can. We screen top-notch vintage (silent era) pornography in our outdoor movie theater while serving hot, fresh, on playa made donuts.

Last year we served approximately 3,000 freshly donuts prepared on playa (300 pounds of dry donut mix). We even managed to convert one or two vegetarians along the way.

events.title: All You Need Is Love
events.description:
Hi everyone, come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We humbly invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Welcome to the Burning Man Guild Workshops! For the first time ever, Burning Man is hosting a series of workshops in a Florentine piazza-style format to have Masters of various craftsmanship skills teach our students the arts of the Renaissance. 

We, The Three Faced (Stone) Wench Workshop/Guild, are offering a series of classes you would love to attend! 

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various actual old time techniques over several days to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. As part of our commitment to up-cycle, we will utilize and recycle actual (old foam insulation) building materials. Participants will learn to recreate various historical stone mixtures that compromise the the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. This artifact creation will be followed by (and applied) techniques to 'age' their artwork with the patina and craquelure of passing time. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes their momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Plastered Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!

That’s not all! 

We are offering a unique community project/event, and we invite everyone to participate with your hearts (and energy): 

We are accomplishing a recreation of Gustav Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze (Ode To Joy), with a slight twist on the theme: “All You Need Is Love.” The secco fresco artwork will stretch across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida, and of our experiences at Burning Man. 

Please join us! ;o)

Youth ages 12 and up welcome.
events.print_description: A community project to create a secco fresco artwork stretching across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida.

Bootie BRC: Decadent Oasis

events.title: DragonCamp Armory Bikini Shop
events.description:
Come to DragonCamp Armory to make your own Sexy Armor Bikini to wear and share on the Playa! We will teach you simple traditional hand working metal skills to cut, shape, and hammer aluminum into a sexy bikini bra and/or bottom. Decorate with bits of jewelry to personalize yours. Tie with leather thong for a secure fit.  
These are the same metal shaping skills that craftspersons used in Da Vinci’s time to create beautiful works of art. Wear and share yours here at Burning Man! Allow about 2 hours for completion. Come early- limited supplies. Feel free to bring any small or broken baubles, earrings, etc.  to donate or help decorate bikinis with. 

Your partner can come watch, but this is primarily  a workshop  to empower women to learn to use simple hand tools to release their inner creativity. Costumes like this cost $$$ when purchased.  Make it as sexy as you dare. Yours is free to keep, and you'll be proud to wear it! Since each piece is custom formed for you, it will fit perfectly- large or small. And yes, it is cool, light and comfortable- even on the playa.

(As an added bonus, "Sunny" our resident body painter will also be on hand to offer body decoration if anyone who wants to wear even less!)

events.title: 2nd Annual Black Rock City Beer Mile!!
events.description:
Join us for the 2nd annual Black Rock City Beer Mile. 

BYOB and a ziploc in case you puke!

Join us for the 2nd annual Black Rock City Beer Mile!!!!

Drink a beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer, run 400 meters.

If you puke, you need to drink a penalty beer.

All participants MUST bring their own beers (a 6 pack is best in case you puke) AND you MUST run with a large ziploc bag (in case you puke, bc Burning Man is a Leave No Trace Event). 

All beer mile rules must be followed:
http://www.beermile.com/rules

Please arrive a few minutes early for registration (yep, numbers this year). Heckling is encouraged. This will be fun. Sometimes, the best beer milers are NOT runners...and sometimes, the best runners are NOT good beer milers. It's fun no matter what!

events.title: Black Rock Playa Dust - what's in it?
events.description: Black Rock Playa Dust - what's in it? Is it bad for you? How do you clean it up? - Geologist George Davis will give a full explanation of the chemical and mineralogical data from a playa sample inside of BRC in 2010. Find out the good and bad things about playa dust. Ever had trouble cleaning up after the trip to BRC? Learn a great recipe which involves simple household ingredients which removes playa dust once and for all. In addition, it's environmentally friendly and non-toxic. REAL 'Better living through chemistry' with a demo.

events.title: The Orgasamator Experience
events.description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private. Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.

events.title: Come Make Pinhole Photographs with Pinhole Project
events.description: Remember that lesson in art class where you made a camera out of an oatmeal box? Pinhole Project invites you to check out our cameras, do an art tour, and make art on the playa!  Each year, we shoot, develop and fix about one hundred photographs on the playa each Burning Man. he Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject. We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa. The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999.
events.print_description: Check out our pinhole cameras, do an art tour, and make art. Head out for photo fun on the playa with Pinhole Project, we do pinhole photography!

events.title: The "Game"
events.description: Divinici was said to have "unquenchable curiosity" and "feverishly inventive imagination". When those same concepts are applied to social interaction, AMAZING things come in to existence.   The Game has a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written. “The Game” has a tendency to create possibilities where there were once boundaries. Choices where there were once obstacles. “The Game”: the love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and "American's Got talent".. “The Game” is perfect for letting one's imagination out to play. Watch what happens when permission is given to create, with wanton abandon. “The Game” is both a game of chance and skill if you want to believe that.  Remove a self-limiting perspective, gain new insights in creative problem solving.  Come play 'The Game'
events.print_description: The Game”: love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and "American's Got talent". Come see what can happen!

events.title: Guild Workshops Masquerade Procession & Opening
events.description:
Guild Workshops Masquerade Procession & Grand Opening

All are invited to the Grand Opening of the Guild Workshops in the piazza at the Man Base! Join us as we celebrate the confluence of artists, makers, tinkerers, and craftspeople from across the world! Among these modern day maker spaces conceived in the spirit of the Renaissance you’ll find glassblowers, blacksmiths, dreamers, chainsaw-wielding portrait makers, musicians and engineers all beckoning your hands on participation in their craft!

The festivities will kick off with a costumed masquerade procession starting at 5:45pm at the Everywhere/Artery Pavilion (6:15 and Esplanade) and leading into the Guild Workshops at the Man Base, where our Guild Workshops Celebration will begin at 6:30 pm. Please don your Renaissance-inspired finery or just come as your creative self! 

► Burning Man 2016: Da Vinci’s Workshop
bit.ly/GuildWorkshopsInfo
► 2016 Man Pavilion and Guild Workshops
http://bit.ly/GuildWorkshopsList
► Da Vinci’s Workshop Guilds : Burning Man 2016 Facebook Page
https://www.facebook.com/BurningManGuilds
events.print_description: Don your Renaissance finery for the parade, then participate with our global community of Guilds: artists, dreamers, makers, tinkerers & craftspeople.

events.title: Passion Experience - Nadav Wilf
events.description:
Long Description:

The Lifestyle Perfected Passion Experience: Living the Life You Love

In this fun and enlivening workshop, you will learn a new context for passion and how to consistently live in a passionate state. Imagine living your life where you are spending the majority of your time doing what you love? Feeling alive and excited about waking up in the morning to experience the day. What would that be like for you? 

Through this workshop you will create a step by step process to:
Understand a new context for passion
Get a clear picture of your passions and what you love to do
Create the steps and room in your life to do things you are passionate about
Share your passions with others to build a community of likeminded people
See an increase in happiness and living a life you love
events.print_description: Passion is not something we have, it's who we are. Learn how to balance your life and spend the majority of your time living in your passions.

You are invited to come as a kid, at any age, to dance around the fire, to curl up and listen to stories, to read aloud your favorite kids book or to tell a story from your heart. events.title: Contraexpression
events.description:
Do you want to experience poetry of the body while hardly moving at all? 
 Contraexpression is not passivity or the anti-expression; it’s 'contrary-expression' of any expressive stimulus, and it’s irresistible. There is no wrong way to do this.
 
 Open the door to your body to express the unimaginable. 
 
 In the experience, you will be guided through a passage in which you find your own way of moving the body. I don’t ask anyone to move their body in a rhythm, nor engage bodies, nor expect that all the people do the same action. People don’t need to follow a pattern or imitate; it’s experiential, there is no wrong way to do this. I give directions based on trust in the body, and what it can manifest. The person will discover how to adapt these directions to their understanding and needs. Maybe someone can move rapidly, maybe another can move slowly, or hardly at all — each one with their own development and course of action.
 
 This workshop focuses on the method of “The Unknown Theater” (El Teatro Desconocido) directed by Juan Carlos De Petre and developed over forty years by a group of people concentrated on exploration of subtle expression. The practice reveals knowledge; we start from the consciousness of not-knowing — ignorance is the beginning. This knowledge is experimental and creative; not intellectual, preconceived, acquired through repetition, or memory. Participants will work as a unique being, independent, and according to their own development. You can overcome intimidation and shame; discover empowerment, physical malleability, and grace.
events.print_description: Do you want to experience poetry of the body while hardly moving at all? There is no wrong way to do this.

events.title: Kundalini Acro Reactivation
events.description:
We live in a shared dream, fractals of the same consciousness appreciating individuation. Within and without, our inner nature reflects into our outer reality. We can choose our vibrational frequency. A divine playmate can help enhance our ability to grow into new spaces in the universe considerably. 
 
 Acknowledging that we are the same self projecting through unique layerings of stories, we can assist one another in rebuilding the body, our temple for spirit. Reaching out into every direction of your universe and expanding consciousness with the breath, we can reactivate the energetic body together. 
 
 We'll be delving into how to realign the spine, our antenna to unity consciousness using acro yoga paired with kundalini energetic healing. The physical body is the intermediary for every dimension of our existence. By arousing kundalini energy the practitioner can activate third eye so that the distortions may be witnessed as they are released.
 
 We are our own best healer. Working together we can amplify the effects of our alchemical growth while releasing post traumatic stress from past lives and feeling trust again.
events.print_description: Cosmic dancing together, loving all that is alchemically. Realigning the spine with kundalini activation and acro, rebuilding the temple.

events.title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Eugene Hedlund @ RhythmWave
events.description: 5Rhythms with Eugene Hedlund is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed! It’s a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirements are a body that is still breathing, a mind that is still curious, and a heart that is still beating. All are invited to join Eugene on the bamboo at RhythmWave, as we flow through our 10th consecutive year in Black Rock City!

events.title: Scotch & Hop: Scotch Bar
events.description: Bringing out childhood memories and mixing them in with adult libations, comes Scotch & Hop. Combining the fun game of Hop Scotch with one of the most wonderful beverages to grace the planet, Scotch makes for an entertaining and social area where people from all areas, and even all ages (with Children, being the under-21 crowd,) creating a silly and fun set of events bringing out the child in all of us. The social events for Scotch & Hop take different types and games of Hop Scotch from all over the world, and have people jump around and play various forms of the game. Once a Black Rock citizen, who is over 21, has completed a game, they are invited in for a Scotch or Scotch cocktail. (And usually we include other adult-beverages.) Getting young and old, from all across the planet, together and playing Hop Scotch makes people remember the silliness of when they were kids. Also being able to have children be able to play along in the games opens up the experience to everyone.
events.print_description: Bring out childhood memories and mixing them in with adult libations, Hop Scotch & Scotch. (All ages welcome, 21+ to enjoy Scotch).

Get your chi chis painted and bedecked in sheer fashions or a gravity defying brassiere. Your knockers will be a knock out! events.title: Reimagining the Village
events.description:
"Intentional living, micro-communities, sustainable developments, matriarchies: What does the next generation of conscious housing arrangements look like?

How can we create happier, healthier, more sustainable human developments, facilitating an evolution of consciousness through innovating and architecting the future through our homes?

Sustainable, tribal micro-communities are the future of this planet: come to hear experts discuss intentional community formation - what works, what doesn't, best practices, and how we can evolve consciousness through innovative tribal architecture."

events.title: Acro Yoga Kundalini  Reactivation
events.description:
We live in a shared dream, fractals of the same consciousness appreciating individuation. Within and without, our inner nature reflects into our outer reality. We can choose our vibrational frequency. A divine playmate can help enhance our ability to grow into new spaces in the universe considerably. 
 
 Acknowledging that we are the same self projecting through unique layerings of stories, we can assist one another in rebuilding the body, our temple for spirit. Reaching out into every direction of your universe and expanding consciousness with the breath, we can reactivate the energetic body together. 
 
 We'll be delving into how to realign the spine, our antenna to unity consciousness using acro yoga paired with kundalini energetic healing. The physical body is the intermediary for every dimension of our existence. By arousing kundalini energy the practitioner can activate third eye so that the distortions may be witnessed as they are released.
 
 We are our own best healer. Working together we can amplify the effects of our alchemical growth while releasing post traumatic stress from past lives and feeling trust again.
events.print_description: Realigning the spine with kundalini activation and acro, rebuilding the temple. Cosmic dancing together, loving all that is alchemically.

events.title: The Orgasamator Experience
events.description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private. Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.
events.print_description: The Orgasamator offers intense physical pleasure in an environment that's safe, comfortable, sensual & private.  Exit refreshed & smiling.

Bring your own shirt, but we'll have 20 available on a first-come first-served basis. (Thinner, non-ribbed material works best.)

events.title: Find Your Power Animal
events.description:
Find Your Power Animal. Wake up the shaman in you. What wants to happen now? Ask your spirit guide. Transformation. Healing. Wisdom of circle healings, no guru. Hollow Bone. You are the one you have been waiting for. DIRECT ACCESS TO SOURCE. Eye Gazing gets connected. Paired journies get you empowerment and feedback and confirmation that you are SHAMANISTA. That your own healing modality discipline can segue to shamanism actions with protection, channeling spirit, getting on your mountain, getting in right relation.
 The lynchpin of shamandome sooooo many come for this. eyegaze then paired journies then share.  Time for one more journey you invent that seems timely: “heart/mind/sex connection. Incarnation. Best playa week is….”
>> BONUS EVENT AT SHAMANDOME:  Want an Opportunity to create your Spirit/Power Animal in art after your Shamanic Journey ?
Something insists on artistic expression from your Shamanic Healing?
Want to manifest your Inner World and make the Invisible Visible?

Doug Abrahams of Sunrising Artists talent agency hosts. *note to all sign up artists…SDS has a 1-2 song limit pending time and number of participants

Before the end of our time together we'll venture into the realm of Meditation in Action and Contemplative Dance. (2 hr class)

events.title: 9 Energies - Know Your SuperPower
events.description:
At 9 Energies Pavillion - Come find out Your Natural Energy. Understanding your Natural Energy enables you to recognize your gifts, gain a better understanding of yourself and others so that you can live a happier and more embodied life. Through a simple physical process your body reveals your great natural abilities. Once you know you Natural Energy you can consciously use this power to move yourself forward.

9 Energies is open daily 10-4pm. We also offer a morning meditation at opening to support understanding how to use your body to grow your awareness of the Natural Energies. Please come sober!

events.title: Activating The Voice of The Playa
events.description:
The Playa is speaking, can you hear Her? The Playa, the sacred land on which Burning Man is held, is governed by a divine force, emanating directly from the consciousness of Mother Nature. 

This workshop will teach you how to awaken the voice of The Playa within your own being and let Her guide the creation of experiences at Burning Man that deepen, heal, and transform your relationship to yourself, others and the planet.
events.print_description: Do you speak Playa? Come learn how to open to the divine voice of The Playa and let Her enliven your Burning Man experience.

events.title: Play in the Desert Darkroom with Pinhole Project
events.description: Come develop photographs and play with us, we do pinhole photography! Pinhole Project invites you to help us in the Desert Darkroom! We maintain a full wet black and white photographic darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs. Photographs made of paper with traditional chemicals and no digital input. The Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject. We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa. The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999.

events.title: The Arts of Buon Fresco Revealed
events.description:
Hi everyone, come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We humbly invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Welcome to the Burning Man Guild Workshops! For the first time ever, Burning Man is hosting a series of workshops in a Florentine piazza-style format to have Masters of various craftsmanship skills teach our students the arts of the Renaissance. 

We, The Three Faced (Stone) Wench Workshop/Guild, are offering a series of classes you would love to attend! 

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various actual old time techniques over several days to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. As part of our commitment to up-cycle, we will utilize and recycle actual (old foam insulation) building materials. Participants will learn to recreate various historical stone mixtures that compromise the the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. This artifact creation will be followed by (and applied) techniques to 'age' their artwork with the patina and craquelure of passing time. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes their momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Plastered Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!

That’s not all! 

We are offering a unique community project/event, and we invite everyone to participate with your hearts (and energy): 

We are accomplishing a recreation of Gustav Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze (Ode To Joy), with a slight twist on the theme: “All You Need Is Love.” The secco fresco artwork will stretch across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida, and of our experiences at Burning Man. 

Please join us! ;o)

Youth ages 12 and up welcome.
events.print_description: Let’s get PLASTERED! Apprentices will learn Art of Fresco. Upon completion of a fresco block, they’ll be CERTIFIED Plastered Master of the Playa!

It is possible to shape shift, time travel, change your age or status, safely feel fire, and even go against the laws of physics. Through Hypnosis we can travel far out into imaginary places, safely remove emotional blockages, as well as shift negative patterns and limiting beliefs that prevent our clients from having the intimate lives that they crave.

events.title: Hypno Birthing - Charmaine Hamp
events.description: In this talk, I will unravel the idea that there has to be pain in Childbirth. I will talk about where pain in childbirth originated and how through our own awareness and education we can also have a birth with little to no pain. I will talk about the history of HypnoBirthing and how in its 25 year history it is now in over 40 countries astonishing and empowering woman everywhere to take back their power in motherhood. I will explain briefly the tools and the processes used from the breath work, meditation, self-hypnosis, and affirmations to achieve an easy, often pain free birth. I will also share the numerous benefits of this simple but super effective course! After all Birthing can be one of the greatest marathons of your life and you want to be prepared with some training, to feel proud of your results knowing you put in the work and did everything you could.
events.print_description: In this talk, I will unravel the idea that there has to be pain in Childbirth.

events.description: Plastics: we love them and hate them. events.title: We are Story Telling Animals Seminar / Discussion
events.description: Stories: That’s how we have communicated, well I guess as long as we have been able to communicate.  We used stories to pass on information, persuade, and entertain. Stories told by others give us insight into how they think and feel.  When we hear something in a story that we connect with we don’t feel so alone in our own thoughts. Truth is, we are much more likely to remember something if we hear it in a story then just the facts. Humans are social beings and enjoy others for the most part and listing to stories gives us that connection.  But what actually makes up a story? And better yet what makes up a compelling story that engages your audience? Join Writer / Director Robert Hargreaves MFA Screen Writing for this seminar / discussion about Storytelling and Story Tellers. We will be serving Espresso Shots & Cookies
events.print_description: Stories give us insight into how others think & feel. What actually is a story? What makes a story engage? Join our romp about Storytelling. Espresso

events.title: Embodied Intimacy
events.description:
"Embodied Intimacy is relational breathing meditation done in full body embrace, cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now. Utilizing the core tools of Tantra: Breath, Sound, Movement and Touch we are slowing down, and we are being together just as we are. As we slow down and link up breath and sound we create all these exquisite feedback loops- body to body, belly to belly, heart to heart, and we invite each other into more and more presence, trust and relaxation.

Embodied Intimacy guides everyone gently from a state of separation and isolation towards safety and oxytocin fueled connection. The result is a simple felt presence, real time intimacy and heartfelt shared truth. The story and drama of the mind subsides and a new level of being is found in its place. In-To-Me-I-See. Sound by Sound, sigh by sigh, breath by breath it all unfolds, melts and unwinds. At the speed of love we learn how to live from the wisdom of our heart instead of the worry of our minds.
"
events.print_description: Embodied Intimacy is relational breathing meditation cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now.

events.title: The Orgasamator Experience
events.description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private. Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.

events.title: The Arts of Buon Fresco Revealed
events.description:
Hi everyone, come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We humbly invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Welcome to the Burning Man Guild Workshops! For the first time ever, Burning Man is hosting a series of workshops in a Florentine piazza-style format to have Masters of various craftsmanship skills teach our students the arts of the Renaissance. 

We, The Three Faced (Stone) Wench Workshop/Guild, are offering a series of classes you would love to attend! 

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various actual old time techniques over several days to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. As part of our commitment to up-cycle, we will utilize and recycle actual (old foam insulation) building materials. Participants will learn to recreate various historical stone mixtures that compromise the the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. This artifact creation will be followed by (and applied) techniques to 'age' their artwork with the patina and craquelure of passing time. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes their momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Plastered Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!

That’s not all! 

We are offering a unique community project/event, and we invite everyone to participate with your hearts (and energy): 

We are accomplishing a recreation of Gustav Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze (Ode To Joy), with a slight twist on the theme: “All You Need Is Love.” The secco fresco artwork will stretch across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida, and of our experiences at Burning Man. 

Please join us! ;o)

Youth ages 12 and up welcome.
events.print_description: Let’s get PLASTERED! Apprentices will learn Art of Fresco. Upon completion of a fresco block, they’ll be CERTIFIED Plastered Master of the Playa!

events.title: The UN's Agenda 2030 and Sustainable Development
events.description: Achieving a sustainable future requires increasing our collective impact by aligning efforts within our communities and with broader initiatives.  Learn about leading international and national initiatives, including the UN's Agenda 2030 and Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and UNESCO's new Global Action Programme (GAP) on education for sustainable development.  Explore examples of how schools, colleges, government agencies, and community programs are building tangible projects, resource tools, networks, and outreach efforts that increase education, training, and public awareness campaigns.  Realize how you can make a difference.
events.print_description: Learn about increasing our collective impact through international and national initiatives. Explore examples of ways to be a local and global citizen

events.title: The Temple — Convertere [clothing optional]
events.description:
<< The Temple >>

We are each a temple [literally "place cut off," from stem of “tem” — to cut].  Inside each temple are housed experiences that are the basis of how we comprehend ourselves.  The temple that we are is an adventure.  In that adventure we are swimming through contradictions, polarity, wonder, desires, embarrassments; our emotions, feelings, curiosities, wounds, traumas.

In the temple, what develops is the movement of the psyche. Maibel and Anthony serve as psychopomp guides through the temple with different exercises, taking participants on a trip that expands comprehension of their human complexity, our connection to each other, the need to explore the conversations that we never had. 
　
　
<< The Temple — Convertere >>

You’ll engage in play that explores the unsaid. Go to where you can’t go alone. Reveal. Listen. Question. Vent. Return to yourself through each other.  Convertere means converter, deriving from “turn around, transform, come-together, to turn, to return.”  C/O*
　
　
<< Your psychopomps >>

Maibel was born in Caracas, Venezuela, and while residing in Buenos Aires, Argentina, she developed an acting process through the use of group research and play creation experience. She’s a permanent member of the Unknown Theater Group in Buenos Aires, which for 40 years has been a proponent of the Unknown Experience art form. 

Anthony organizes naturist and intimacy-building events in NYC and South Florida.  His mentors include Christina Berkley, Guy Sengstock, John Thompson, Sean Wilkinson, Sara Ness, Amy Silverman, Jordan Myska Allen, Gina Brezini, and Nicole Daedone.

We moderate a Facebook group called The Temple exploring the unknown, the unheard, the unsaid — and union. And another called Colony where we encourage conscious, smart, and progressive social nudism and sexuality.  

　
*Clothing optional.  Nudity is not a requirement.
events.print_description: Engage in play that explores the unsaid. Go to where you can’t go alone. Reveal. Listen. Question. Vent. Return to yourself through each other.

events.title: Qoya- Gratitude is a Superpower
events.description:
"What you look for is what you see? If you look for gratitude, you will surely find it. 
 
 Qoya is based on the idea through movement, we remember. We remember our essence is wise, wild and free. Wise, wild and free also draw reference to the movement forms that we practice. Wise- the wisdom of yoga. Wild- the creative expression in dance. Free- expanding our capacity to enjoy being in our bodies through more sensual and feminine flowing movement. In Qoya, there is no way you can do it wrong and the way you know you're doing it right is that it feels good in your body. More than feeling good, is that it feels honest."

events.title: Straya Day: Party like an Australian!
events.description:
Now in it’s 3rd year Straya Day is an Australian themed BBQ party with Australian food and drinks to try, fun games to play and some rocking Aussie tunes. 

Whether you’re one of us or just enjoy our silly accents come and enjoy some fair dinkum Australian culture, dinky-di beer and ridgy-didge food on us. Play some Goon of Fortune, give cricket a burl, hug a koala or belt out some Aussie pub anthems. This is the official meet up for Aussies on the playa but we also really want to share our culture with our American (and other) friends so everyone is welcome! You’d have to be mad as a cut snake to miss it!

If you’re an Aussie headed over for the burn and you’d like to help out by smuggling in some Cherry Ripes, Fantales or even maybe a bottle of Bundy track us down on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/groups/BurningManAussies2016/) and give us a shout.
events.print_description: Dinky-di party with Aussie food, drinks, games & tunes. Official meet up for Aussies at the burn but we want to share our culture so all are welcome!

events.title: The Orgasamator Experience
events.description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private. Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.
events.print_description: The Orgasamator offers intense physical pleasure in an environment that's safe, comfortable, sensual & private.  Exit refreshed & smiling.

events.title: The Temple — Nuptias [clothing optional]
events.description:
<< The Temple >>

We are each a temple [literally "place cut off," from stem of “tem” — to cut].  Inside each temple are housed experiences that are the basis of how we comprehend ourselves.  The temple that we are is an adventure.  In that adventure we are swimming through contradictions, polarity, wonder, desires, embarrassments; our emotions, feelings, curiosities, wounds, traumas.

In the temple, what develops is the movement of the psyche. Maibel and Anthony serve as psychopomp guides through the temple with different exercises, taking participants on a trip that expands comprehension of their human complexity, our connection to each other, the need to explore the conversations that we never had. 
　
　
<< The Temple — Nuptias >>

Can partners be more free together than apart?  A new comprehension of polyamory and exclusivity: the Hermetic Relationship.  C/O*
　
　
<< Your psychopomps >>

We—Anthony and Maibel—live the experience of returning to themselves through each other. We enjoy practices that stimulate these experiences that make us more vulnerable, more naked, more pure, more devoted.

We moderate a Facebook group called The Temple exploring the unknown, the unheard, the unsaid — and union. And another called Colony where we encourage conscious, smart, and progressive social nudism and sexuality.
events.print_description: Can partners be more free together than apart?  A new comprehension of polyamory and exclusivity: the Hermetic Relationship.

The White Trash came out to learn about their interesting "habits," and demonstrated how to make everything a little bit more glamorous and trashy. This year, we're going to be doing the same with the Super-Duper Photo Essay. Lectures and bedazzling are just the start as a review on White Trash participation in Black Rock City.

events.title: Last Annual Armageddon Alley Cat
events.description: Have you got a two-wheeled human powered contraption you think is fit to outrun the devil on a suped up segway during armageddon? Are you ready for the event of a lifetime? Join Camp Armageddon for the first ever Last Annual Armageddon Alley Cat Bicycle Race. Show up early to fill up your gas tanks at the camp party between 4 to 6 pm. The race will start shortly after the party ends, how long it will last is determined by how fast you ride. Some things that might come in handy along the way are the playa art map, a water bottle, and the capacity to hold any moop you might find along the way. Remember to ride fast, have fun, and be safe; ideally in that order because there will be a prize for the winner!

events.description: We will explore ideas and items from the past that can be used today to help us live a more sustainable lifestyle by cutting back on waste and energy usage. The universe is preparing you for something much greater and like a sling shot, it’s going to shoot you forward, but you just have to move backwards for a little bit. “Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.” ~Albert Einstein . Mike BIlbo, LNT master with anti-plastic blogger activist, Beth Terry.

events.title: The Magic Of Human Connection!
events.description: Lets go on an adventure together! In this adventure, we see that every time we interact with another human there is a potential for magic to occur! events.title: Morphic Field Movement
events.description:
Movement precedes us, we don’t create movement. This practice is not dance, body expression, theater, nor performance — it is a composition of these, and more. We will use the intelligence of the movement to communicate. 
 
 You can move being encouraged and guided by the intelligence of morphic fields (Rupert Sheldrake has published credible research about this). A morphic field is a field of energy that stores information; in the field exist dynamics, settings, games, processes; it is a memory field, it is an intelligent field. A morphic field is created when any of us introduces an intention and an action in space and time, which after being performed several times becomes a specific intelligence, then that intelligence influences the actions of a whole group and creates a memory of a way of doing things. We can create morphic fields at will, because our intelligence is able to. In a morphic field the communication is easy and instantaneous. What this workshop proposes is the creation of fields of intelligence through movement, because I believe that as human beings we are prepared to communicate with new languages. Art informs certain languages ​​that are developed over time, and perhaps now it's time to take those languages ​​as structures that allow us a different way to function in life.
 
 Morphic Field Movement becomes physical expression, borne from body languages, from the poetry of the body, from the clear expression of the bodies...
events.print_description: This practice is not dance, body expression, theater, nor performance — it is a composition of these, and more.

events.title: Exploring Conscious Touch
events.description:
"We are all yearning for greater connection, yet often find ourselves lacking a place where we may explore while having our boundaries honored in each moment.
 
 Come co-create this special evening where we will be invited to find our ease in connection.
 
 Touch is a place where we as humans are often feeling a lack, but have an edge around asking for what we may desire or need. 
 
 Let us create a container where all may be witnessed in their desire. A container where guilt, shame and fear around giving and receiving touch may be stripped away. Where we simply interact with consciousness and choice and that each honoring of another further honors ourselves.
 
 We will begin with a simple ceremony of seeing and being seen, so that we may drop into presence with one another. 
 
 From there we will co-create our agreements and boundaries for the evening. Then we will engage in some guided massage, so that no one needs worry about skill or technique. We can all learn and explore together.
 
 Elemental massage is a beautiful way to welcome our bodies and explore differing kinds of activating and sensation touch.
 
 Know that you may choose to participate with a particular partner. All boundaries around partnership, touch and clothing will be honored. 
 
 This is an evening of self-exploration, opening to our natural touch-positive nature in a way which is intended to open more pathways to self-love."
events.print_description: Practice energetic and physical touch with guidance including Elemental Massage

events.title: Experience Channeling Authentic Expression
events.description:
"Focusing on communication through voice and movement, performance and flow- an interactive workshop of playful exploration that results in deeply powerful embodiment.
An improvisatory opera singer and performance artist, Amanda Gregory (Xeno Glossya) guides the participants through unique exercises that unlock authentic expression and create the experience of true awe in your friends and/or audience. 
This workshop reveals the golden ticket to “Life is a Stage.”  With newfound facility to calibrate audience and harvest creative potential, participants will discover how to fully surrender into the here and now with effortless performance agility.  
Attendees will gain tools in creating those quintessential jaw-dropping moments one never forgets, with an ever expanding ability to channel archetypes with voice, movement, and being.
And finally- unbridled embodiment.  Paired with heightened listening and awareness, your performance and interactions will profoundly impact your internal experience, and connections with others. "
events.print_description: Through voice and movement, performance and flow-a workshop of playful exploration resulting in deeply powerful embodiment. Led by improv opera singer

events.title: Everywhere/ARTery Opening Celebration
events.description:
Come one, come all to a celebration of the Burning Man community’s efforts around the world! Burning Man Arts & Civic Engagement, The Regional Network, Burners Without Borders and Black Rock Solar invite you to join us for our annual celebration at the new space for Everywhere and the ARTery, as we kick off what promises to be an amazing week on the playa. Why? Because together we are EVERYWHERE and we have amazing global stories to share!

This celebration will end in a Masquerade Procession to the Man Base to celebrate the Guild Workshops in the grant piazza. Bring a mask and your own cup and join us for the whole evening!

events.title: Milk & Honey Shabbat Service and Dinner
events.description: Join us to welcome Shabbat with prayer, reflection, ecstatic singing, and a vegetarian and vegan-friendly meal. Our service is rooted in the Jewish tradition, but all denominations and faiths are welcome to join hands and hearts. Come to our camp as the sun sets. We will welcome the sabbath as a sea of twinkling stars envelops us. After a service, songs, and time to reflect, we will guide you to our dining area and seat you at a communal bedouin-style table. BYO plate, cutlery, and drinks! We will nourish you with a multi-course meal, and ease you into the embrace of an evening in the dust.

Can’t keep the sky from falling, anyway. 

Messy business, evolution. 

Death and resurrection, too.

events.title: Sensual touch and tickling by Domme Sage
events.description: Touch is a vital part of whom we are, how we interact with the world, and most importantly how you connect with a partner or loved one. Many of us have engaged in sensual touch with a lover or tickling at a young age, but are you aware of how well the two can work together to make an amazing sensory experience with someone? Whether it is tickling to tears, to moans of delight, or simply squirming Kelli Lynn Sage (Domme Sage) is well versed in this and will be leading this class in sensual touch and the art of tickling with a partner. Domme Sage has learned the ropes over the years and wants to pass her wisdom on to you. She will instruct you, with the help of her assistants and volunteers, on the art of tickling and sensual touch. This event is for those 18 years old and over (please bring your ID if you look young). We may be requesting volunteers from the audience for some aspects of the class, so if you are eager to be part of this hands on experience let us know. People of all gender identities are welcome to attend. It is best if you can come with a partner so you can practice some of what you learn, if you come alone we cannot guarantee to partner you up with someone. We recommend bringing a towel or something similar to lay on the ground to sit on. In addition we ask that you be respectful of all participants and remind you to ask before touching someone that you have not made arrangements before hand.
events.print_description: Domme Sage will lead a class on how sensual touch and tickling works together to create a fun & erotic experience. Bring a towel/blanket & a partner.

events.title: Music as Medicine: The Easy Way To Heal
events.description:
Music is one of the easiest and most fun ways to heal our hearts and rewire our negative patterns. Learn how to use this timeless remedy to realize your deepest intentions. 

During this interactive event, you'll get access to several of the most talented medicine musicians around and we'll talk about:

- How to use music as a transformational tool
- How to choose the music that will accelerate your healing
- The catalytic power of singing
- The relationship between feeling your emotions and being a talented singer
- Different approaches to creating healing songs
- Healing our world, one song at a time.
Join us!
events.print_description: Learn how to use, choose and create music to realize your deepest intentions.

events.title: Welcome Homebrew Happy Hour and 4:20 Reggae Party
events.description:
Welcome Home Burners!  Getting here was certainly no easy task; planning, compression, travel time, front gate waits, setting up camp, extreme weather, and of course, a lack of sleep.  It’s exhausting, but worth it, and you made it.  Go You!  Now it’s time to celebrate!  

Movement of Jah People and Camp Walter have teamed up to combine two amazing parties into one; The Welcome Homebrew Happy Hour and The 4:20 Reggae Party!!!  Come join us at Camp Walter (10 and Esplanade) between 3-6pm on Monday of burn week.  We'll be serving up some ice cold home brews, while you're getting down to funky reggae jams.  

We look forward to catching up old friends and getting to know the new, see you soon!

Also, if you’re an avid home brewer and wish to share your creation(s), message us.
events.print_description: Welcome Home! Movement of Jah People and Camp Walter have teamed up to bring you jammin' Reggae sound and ice cold, delicious, home brewed beer.

events.title: Samasati Meditation
events.description: Samasati means awareness or consciousness. The purpose of this meditation is to bring awareness to the denial and fear people have regarding death. The goal of this meditation is to practice the art of witnessing rather than reaching to situations and circumstances. Be aware and remember that since you are alive, you must not take your life for granted. Choose the position: 'I will always value my life.' Appreciating my life means waking up every morning and looking into the mirror, and saying to myself, 'I am so happy to be alive!' Thank you Osho, for helping me to create this meditation." I designed this meditation so that it can be done in a group or by yourself. The first six stages are an oppertunity to practice dying consciously, a rehearsal for the end of your life. The remaining four stages are a reminder to live totally and cherish each moment.
events.print_description: Bring awareness to the denial and fear regarding death. The art of witnessing rather than reaching to situations and circumstances.
