events.title: Realtime authentic relating games
events.description:
In this workshop we are going to play a few authentic relating games that center on connection. We stay in the present moment, report on our current experiences, and do our best to stay objective about the observations we make.
 
 For instance, if we want to only say things that are so objective that a camera could pick up on them, we might say "I notice your eyes are squinting and I see you are smiling" instead of "I see that you are happy".
 
 Because we don't know if that person is happy for sure, they could be putting on a face because they are nervous and afraid!
events.print_description: Let's shed judgements and assumptions, and reveal our true selves through connection games!

events.title: Creating a Community Synergy Engine
events.description:
" We know that co-creative tribes exist to facilitate the emergence of the next evolution of the human experience and to liberate global human thriving.  But what are the foundational elements that lead to an optimal community environment where members step into a self directed life in service to the whole?  How do we lead a society that feels overworked, overwhelmed, unfulfilled and disconnected to a human experience of autonomy, self mastery and purpose?

This panel will offer solutions to these questions and an outline that the RISE community is following in pursuit of its mission to liberate human purpose."
events.print_description: "How do we create a community synergy engine that unleashes the fullest expression of each individual’s highest purpose?

events.title: Tantra Heart Dance and Heart Songs Circle
events.description:
You are invited to a special pairing of heart opening practices which invite us to allow more love to flow in, around and through us.
 
 First we enjoy a Tantric Chakra opening Dance where we will feel our place between heaven and Earth through sacred embodied expression
 
 Then in the state of connected bliss Fia will lead us in a heart song circle!
 
 Singing together gives us the space to clear out our energetic field, raise our vibrations and let go of what is no longer serving us. Through singing we can develop deep contact with ourselves, it opens the heart and silence the mind. It connects us with each other and is a way of being present in the now. 
 
 About Fia:
 Fia Forsström is a singer-/songwriter from Sweden who creates music with a wish to move something inside of you. Lyrics that reflects all of life; here is the beautiful and wild, but also the ugly and uncomfortable. She is driven by evoking thoughts and to inspire. She has a great passion for the healing power of singing and creating spaces where people can meet each other just as they are. After experiencing the enormous joy and energy of chanting circles, singing together without any focus on achievement and instead let the song come from the heart, she wants to open up and invite more people to share that magic.
 
 https://www.facebook.com/FiasMusic/
events.print_description: Chakra Opening Dance into Bliss followed by Exquisite Heart Opening songs by Swedish Recording Artist Fia

events.title: The Anatomy of AHA: The neuroscience of the moment
events.description: The sudden moment of insight is at the heart of creativity, motivation and even sustained human change for people of all ages. It turns out that understanding the science of insight can help us have more of them, or make the ones we have more useful. Join Dr. David Rock as he shares the deeper science of the AHA moment, how to have more of them, how to bring others to insight, and even how to increase insights across large systems.
events.print_description: Insight is at the heart of creativity, motivation & sustained human change. Find out why and learn to have a lot more of them.

events.title: The Zendo Project for Psychedelic Harm Reduction
events.description:
Not the kind of fun freaky night you imagined? Things getting a little too weird ...even for Burning Man? The Zendo Project is a place where you can find support during particularly challenging or overwhelming experiences, substance related or otherwise. The Zendo is staffed 24/7 with trained volunteers who offer peer-to-peer counseling support. This is a safe space to land and reconnect with yourself before you head off to your next adventure! We have two locations on D at the 9:00 and 3:00 keyholes. We are open all week, from 8pm on Monday the 29th until 8am on Monday the 5th. If you or a friend are in need of support, come find the Zendo!

Mission
The mission of the Zendo Project is to provide a supportive environment and education to help transform difficult psychedelic and psychological experiences into opportunities for learning and growth.
 
Vision
We envision a world where communities are engaged in providing safety and support for people having psychedelic and psychological challenges; and harm reduction principles are used foremost to reduce the risks associated with substance use.
events.print_description: Compassionate Care and a Safe Space for Overwhelming Situations

events.title: Balancing the Masculine and Feminine with Shara
events.description:
In this interactive and deeply reflective class, we will be looking at blocks in how we run our male/female energy channels, and then do a process of healing and balancing these parts of ourselves.

For you sensitive ones who have been experiencing intense energy and transition, know that the portal is now open for amazing, exponential growth and karma clearing! Now is the PERFECT time to integrate the endings, awakenings, transformations, death and rebirth experiences related to the self and others and to welcome a more balanced exchange between the masculine and feminine as well as man and woman.

Imbalances in females sometimes shows up as feminine infections, shame, control and dis-empowerment issues, suppression of desire, and feelings of inadequacy.  In males it may present as an unfulfillment of sexuality cravings and desires or difficulty connecting fully with the opposite sex.

This class will be a combination of lecture, group shares, and interactive exercises.
events.print_description: In this deeply reflective class, we will be looking at blocks in how we run our male/female energy channels, and then balance ourselves.

events.title: Voices from the Occupation of the Malheur NWR
events.description: The armed occupation of the Malheur National Wildlife Refuge in January 2016 was a significant event in the history of public lands in the west. In this talk Mike Marxen from US Fish and Wildlife Service  will explore words and stories from the occupation that were used to provoke, challenge, resolve and heal. As we gather here and legally "occupy" this desert, what do public lands mean to you?

events.title: French Maid Brigade Parade
events.description:
Now that Burning Man has become a maker fair under the aegis of the Renaissance Faire, there is a lot more than the usual dust up over the direction and identity of this quaint event in the Nevada desert. This year’s dust shall be comprised of marble, sandstone, oak, and pewter, a highly controversial mixture never before introduced to the Black Rock desert. Because they don’t mess around when it comes to preserving intact the native chemical profile of the immediate environment of the Black Rock desert, the Bureau of Land Management has mandated extra precautions for 2016. As such, the BLM has required that BMOrg retain the services of the French Maid Brigade. It’s nothing we wouldn’t be doing anyway. 

Rendezvous with us! You too can be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa—please bring: feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, and any other useful cleaning equipment. Join us in uniform with your surly attitude and worst possible French accent.

On Thursday at 2:00 pm we meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward that dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!
events.print_description: Da Vinci’s Workshop is a dusty mess. Join us in uniform with your feather duster, surly attitude, and your worst possible French accent.

events.title: Merkaba: Tasting The Infinite Through Breath
events.description:
In this dynamic presentation & event participants will literally learn and practice how to 'plug themselves into the Infinite.' Utilizing our physiology and breath we will be co-creating a Merkabah Light Body Activation.
Merkabah activation is a 3000 years old breathing technique that allows to open a portal in our heart chakra. This will bring us to feel the vibrations and the energy of the universe. The intensity of the technique depends on the person, ranging from an incredible feeling of ecstasy, until space and time journeys. Being a technique that connects with the inner and higher self, it will also allows to experience breakthroughs, get answers about our lives, solve problems that we didn't even know to have. The more open to receive love and the more open minded we will be, the more we will get from this practice. The technique is as powerful as magical. Almost everybody that have experienced it, described it as mind blowing, many as life changing, some others as the most powerful moment of their life.
Prepare to experience yourself in Totality!

Get your Sexploration on! It’s time to get hot and sexy with other fabulous gender queer, trans, and queer folks!

This party is a safe space for trans, gender queer, gender variant, queer, open minded, unidentified folks to get their freak on. Sexy, hot, & off the hook. Feel free to bring toys, condoms, gloves, lube, and cute people - of course we will also be providing. 
Consent in our GenderBlender dome is a must. Keep it safe, sane, and consensual. We take our consent and safety seriously, if you are not interested in fun safe play, don't show up. If you can't play safely then you can't play in our dome.

events.description: Think poly is complicated enough? Try adding children to the mix. Weather you're poly with children, or otherwise in an open relationship with or contemplating children, this special Poly High Tea discussion is for you. Bring the kids and lets hear from them if you like (or dare)! If all this seems overly daunting, don't worry - it is! So let's put our dusty heads and hearts together and see what we come up with. This is an open discussion facilitated by Peter & Gretchen (aka Adam & Eve) about all things poly with children. This will be their 8th Burn, and the second with their 5 year old daughter, Veronica. events.title: The Art of Flow: The Key to Effortless Living
events.description:
"In this deeply transformational, interactive workshop, Jackie and Justin will be sharing the key principles and practices you will need to master to start living fully in the flow and experience how effortless, abundant and free your life can become.  People who master the art of living in flow often feel as if the universe is conspiring in their favor as everything they want and need to be successful, grow and live a truly extraordinary life begins to come to them effortlessly and in perfect synchronicity.  Once you have experienced it, there is no other way to live.

Expect to walk away having integrated a deep understanding of:

+ What the flow is and how to identify the choices and actions which will you bring into alignment with it
+ How to create exponential success and growth in your life and business from a place of effortlessness and flow
+ Techniques for accessing and getting in touch with your intuition and inner wisdom for crystal clear guidance on which path will be the most effortless and fulfilling for you
+ How to let go of struggle, suffering and the fear of surrendering control to the wisdom of life and move into a profound place of trust
+ Simple but powerful practices to be able to call in whatever support and resources you need to further your journey of expansion, personal and spiritual growth and be successful living your passion and giving your gifts to the world"
events.print_description: Discover powerful practices for bringing your life deeply into the flow and creating exponential growth and success from a place of effortlessness.

events.title: Shamata and Walking Meditation
events.description:
Bring your neurotic mind, tame it, and go enjoy your burn having a sense of who the fuck you really are. Connect with your true grounded self.

I have practiced this meditation by myself for about 2 years. I am curious to see how this will work in a group setting as this would be a new experience for me. It is an open-eye meditation technique that focuses on the breath while also taking in your surroundings. The walking meditation focuses on the sensation your feet feel while walking at a slow place in a small circle. This practice helps form a connection with the earth as a sense of grounding. With practice, this technique helps one discover who they really are, not who they feel they are supposed to be. It has done wonders for me and truly changed my life. The instructions are very brief and basic and each person's experience is unique.

events.title: Unconditional Healing
events.description:
Tired of searching for a cure for your grief. Let go this notion and.develop a proper psychological state of mind and begin to heal.

This approach to healing is based on the Eastern philosophy of synchronizing the body and the mind. Once we do that we can begin to truly heal from any emotional or physical issues we're dealing with. I've practiced a technique called a body scan which helps join body and mind. I'm curious to see how this would work in a group setting as this would be a new experience for me. After the body scan, I plan to start by asking everyone what they want to heal from and from there perhaps develop a common theme among the participants or just see what comes up and go with the energy in the dome.

events.title: Quantum Sound & Sacred Scalar Energy MEDITATION
events.description:
TONE YOUR SOUL offers…
Quantum Sound & Sacred Scalar Energy GROUP MEDITATION
 
Uproot unproductive subconscious thought patterns, shed pounds of emotional baggage and re-ignite your connection to Source!

Stand in your strength and actualize your greatest life!
 
In this experiential journey facilitated by Sharon & Lothlorien, you will participate in a group meditation using Quantum Sound Technologies as a method of Energetic Stress Release.

As well, the VAS (Voice Analysis System) Technology analyzes the groups voice sample, and then creates custom frequencies that the group then listens to. What’s in YOUR Voice is in YOUR Life
 
The leading premise of the VAS technology is that every human voice has a unique frequency that is measurable. These tones will balance and harmonize the group energy and facilitate personal shifts on many levels.
 
Please bring yoga mat/towel and pillow and get comfortable.

Sharon is a licensed Spiritual Health Coach and grateful for the opportunity to share these amazing tools for change.
events.print_description: Uproot limiting subconscious thought patterns, shed pounds of emotional baggage and ignite your connection to Source through an experiential journey!

events.title: Feldenkrais-Easing playa pains
events.description:
Ready to free yourself from all those playa aches and pains? 

Feldenkrais is a gentle, subtle and effective approach to healing. It helps with blood flow, the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. 

Be prepared to lay down, relax and attune to yourself as Shara guide’s you through gentle simple movement sequences guaranteed to shift your nervous system to a place of more serenity, comfort, and joy. Please bring a mat or blanket if you have one. 

The perfect way to rejuvenate your tired playa body

events.title: Feldenkrais— Opening your Heart
events.description:
At the seat of our souls, core to all of our ambition and desire lies our heart. The heart is the center of our love, compassion, forgiveness and inner peace.
 
 We will begin this class with a heart opening meditation followed by a Feldenkrais lesson that will help us to open our hearts and connect more deeply with our bodies.
 
 The Feldenkrais method emphasizes the connection between the mind, body, and spirit. Though gentle, relaxing, non-impactful movement sequences along with inspirational meditation, you will leave the day standing straighter and taller and with your shoulders falling back behind your chest, hence allowing you to lead with your heart as you walk forward into the world.
 
 Think of Feldenkrais as meditation with movement! 
 
 If you are experiencing any pain, you might find it improve or resolve throughout the class. Feldenkrais helps with the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns.
 
 As we radiate more love out into the world, the world can’t help but smile back. And with that, only magical shifts can follow.
events.print_description: We will begin this class with a heart opening meditation followed by a Feldenkrais lesson. Please bring a yoga mat

events.title: The Evolutionary Psychology of Polyamory
events.description: Are human naturally monogamous or promiscuous?  Neither view makes sense given what we've learned about human sexual psychology in the last couple of decades. Most of us seem to have evolved over the last million years to be polyamorous by nature. But we are socialized into monogamist mating norms that amplify sexual jealousy, reduce compersion, stifle our sexual sovereignty, and limit the social networks that we instinctively try to build through lovers and metamours. In this talk, a leading evolutionary psychology professor (author of 'The Mating Mind', 'Spent', and 'Mate') will give a quick, fun overview of the new science behind poly. Then we'll have a Q&A.
events.print_description: A fun intro to the new science showing that most humans evolved to be naturally polyamorous rather than monogamous or promiscuous.

events.title: Jazz Funeral for the Man
events.description:
We invite all of Black Rock City to join us in our march from the French Quarter to the ashes of the Man, and back. A smaller procession will continue on to the Temple with remembrances. The mood is joyous, humorous, melancholy, sultry, and respectful, all at once. It is a time in which we honor the dead by living life to the fullest.

Before the parade, there will be an impromptu brunch in the French Quarter, and everyone is encouraged to bring whatever they would like to cook or share. Musicians are all welcome to join the main line. Mutant vehicles and other participants are all welcome to join the second line. If you are not bringing an instrument, feel free to bring libations or hydration to support the march.

events.title: Investing In The Future We Want
events.description: Ibrahim AlHusseini is an award winning entrepreneur, impact investor and philanthropist known for founding FullCycle Energy Fund. FullCycle is dedicated to revolutionizing our relationship with waste by turning our costly global garbage crisis into clean fuel that can power communities worldwide. In this compelling talk Ibrahim will share his personal journey that began as a young immigrant from the Middle East and led to him becoming a successful entrepreneur and an award winning impact investor. He will share how his experiences shaped his career and life and how it’s the choices we make today that will ultimately determine the quality of life of future generations.  His accomplishments and devotion to making a difference are inspiring but it’s his passion for sharing the power of giving back with others that makes him a sought after speaker worldwide.  The audience will leave knowing the power we have to make a difference and how to create the future we all want.
events.print_description: Ibrahim will share his dedication to solving our greatest social and environmental problems through impact investing.

events.title: Phrygianism and the Refoamation
events.description:
Adam Eidinger spills the beans on organizing creative direct action as an art form. A leader in the camp Refoamation, Adam's philosophy of Phrygianism combines citizen action, psychedelics and civil defense.  In 2014 Adam legalized marijuana in Washington, DC and will talk strategy.  He'll also speak about the Liberty Cap and its role for thousands of years connecting liberation struggles since Roman times as well the to cap's connection to psychedelic spirituality in the Mithra tradition

Adam has been arrested 18 times fighting for justice in the Belly of the Beast, Washington, DC.  He is the social action director for Dr. Bronner's Magic Soaps and is the foam OG who first set up the magic foam at Burning Man with Kris Bronner in 2009.  Since then he's helped lead the Dr. Bronner' camp (called Refoamation in 2016) as it has expanded its perfoaming activities.  Adam has been making creative plans for major protests since 2000.  His talk will reveal practical tips and advice for anyone activist or non-activist.  Adams lives by the creed of Ralph Nader who once said, "If you don't turn onto politics, politics will turn on you."
events.print_description: Creative direct action as an art form. Adam Eidinger speaks about Phrygianism which combines citizen action and psychedelics.

events.title: The Zendo Project Workshop
events.description:
The Zendo Project provides a supportive environment and specialized care designed to transform difficult psychedelic experiences into valuable learning opportunities, and even potentially offer healing and growth. In turn, our work reduces the number of drug-related hospitalizations and arrests.
 
This year, millions of people will use psychedelics outside of supervised medical contexts, many of them for the first time. Difficult psychedelic experiences can be frightening, but also potentially among the most valuable experiences someone can have. What can you do to help someone having a difficult psychedelic experience? What techniques are available for helping transform a potentially traumatic situation into a positive or even therapeutic one? What role has the Zendo Project played at festivals, and what take-home messages are available for others interested in psychedelic harm reduction?
events.print_description: What can you do to help someone having a difficult psychedelic experience? Learn the principles of Psychedelic Harm Reduction.

events.title: Phrygianism and the Refoamation
events.description:
Adam Eidinger spills the beans on organizing creative direct action as an art form. A leader in the camp Refoamation, Adam's philosophy of Phrygianism combines citizen action, psychedelics and civil defense.  In 2014 Adam legalized marijuana in Washington, DC and will talk strategy.  He'll also speak about the Liberty Cap and its role for thousands of years connecting liberation struggles since Roman times as well the to cap's connection to psychedelic spirituality in the Mithra tradition

Adam has been arrested 18 times fighting for justice in the Belly of the Beast, Washington, DC.  He is the social action director for Dr. Bronner's Magic Soaps and is the foam OG who first set up the magic foam at Burning Man with Kris Bronner in 2009.  Since then he's helped lead the Dr. Bronner' camp (called Refoamation in 2016) as it has expanded its perfoaming activities.  Adam has been making creative plans for major protests since 2000.  His talk will reveal practical tips and advice for anyone activist or non-activist.  Adams lives by the creed of Ralph Nader who once said, "If you don't turn onto politics, politics will turn on you."
events.print_description: Creative direct action as an art form. Adam Eidinger speaks about Phrygianism which combines citizen action and psychedelics.

events.title: BJ Practicum
events.description:
Yep, this really is what you think it is - a "mouth-on" workshop where we'll have a chance to ask questions, compare notes, share techniques, and generally learn from each other to be more skillful at this thing we love - or want to love - to do.  If you're interested in learning more about how to please your man orally, this is the place for you.

Come on ladies / givers, you know you've got some skills - and some questions!  Come share your favorite tips and techniques by words and demonstration, and ask questions that have been plaguing you.

	* Drool or dry? 
	* What about the gag reflex?
	* How do you use hands and still go deep?

And guys, you must have comments you'd like to pass on, other than simply "Yes, please"!

	* Hate teeth?  Want teeth?
	* What about deep throat?

Here's your chance to make your requests - and pet peeves - heard!

This is a participatory event open to couples of any combination, so long as one of them has some phallic protuberance and the other is applying lips, tongue, and maybe even throat to it.  No lookie-loos! (Age 18 and up, with ID.)
This was a great fun event at the last Burn.  The presenter's been researching all year to find new tidbits and info to share.  (Hey, someone's gotta do the tough jobs.)  Come show off, learn stuff, and have fun.
events.print_description: Fellate your partner. Watch others. Ask questions. Share tips. Enjoy yourselves in this couples-only workshop on giving better head to men. 18 & over.

events.title: Creative Covalence
events.description:
"Begin with a tour of common design approaches and problems they present, followed with a brief description of Covalence and how it solves those problems.

Learn how to design with Fractal Graphs using Seeds and Core Axioms, then explore a practical example of Covalence in action with Emergence. 

Add depth with a thorough explanation of the Core Axioms of Covalence: Intentions, Relations, and Symmetries, and how Covalence is recursive in nature. 

End with a process exploration of Covalence: how the workshop itself came together using Covalence. Finally provide brief examples of Covalence observed at Burning Man and how participants can start identifying Covalence around them on the Playa. 

Q&A to Close
events.print_description: Transcend lateralization with Covalence: an ideation paradigm facilitating collaborative discovery with relational, intentional, and symmetric lensing

events.title: Trans 101 thru 401 with Dominique
events.description:
The trans phenomenon. What do you know? What do you wish you knew? What would you like to know, but were afraid to ask. This purpose of this workshop is to educate and enlighten those interested in knowing more about this 3% of the public that few understand. This workshop seeks to help transphobic people... Not in a judgmental way... This is meant in a good way. The very basic definition transphobia, is simply being frightened of trans-folks because of misunderstandings or lack of education on all things trans. This is often because the questions you’ve always wanted to ask, are taboo; making it difficult to learn, understand, and honor the transgender path.

Trans 101: The Nuts and Bolts.
A brief PowerPoint discussion of definitions and the basics of gender, gender identity, gender expression, and sexual orientation. How are transgender and cisgender people alike? How are they different?

Trans 201: A Peak Through the Veil.
After learning the basics, we’ll have a Q&A session where any and all questions will be fielded. We all know that there are questions that are deemed inappropriate to ask a transperson. For this brief moment in time, there are no taboos. We will do our best to answer your questions with honesty, transparency, and sincerity.

Trans 301: Dropping the Veil.
We will bare our souls and our bodies for visual inspection and further Q&A.

Trans 401: Shredding the Veil.
For those brave audience members, we will open ourselves to not only visual review, but hands on, or hands in, examination.
events.print_description: The trans phenomenon. Male To Female?  Female To Male?  What you like to know, but were afraid to ask. Get educated and enlightened!

events.title: Harvesting carbon and storing it in hemp buildings
events.description: Leonardo knew about many of the uses of hemp ...  It's a soil remediator and one of the fastest growing, most useful biomass crops for manufacturing that you can farm.  Industrial hemp fibre crops harvest high volumes of carbon very quickly, so farming and building hemp housing is a very effective way to store carbon - each build locks up tonnes of it. The buildings are also thermally effective so you have reduced operational energy costs. The broad opportunities for value adding to fibre crops mean that wherever communities work together with farmers, they can potentially create major positive change.
events.print_description: Harvesting carbon and storing it in hemp buildings - communities leading change: Klara Marosszeky

events.title: The Orgasamator Experience
events.description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private. Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.

events.title: True Love: Beyond Power, Status & Sexuality
events.description:
“Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power.”
Oscar Wilde's words have great explanatory and predictive power, but I'm curious about the limits of this model. 
Where & how does Love come in?
Could True Love honor our drives for power and sex by holding them sacred and taking them with us to the next level? Come explore these themes:
    -How does power & sexuality constrain or inspire intimacy?
    -What's the relationship between fear, control & sex
    -Influence & immortality -the ultimate power
    -Can a conscious partnership creatively co-op our need for control?
    -Could True Love offer a map through the power struggle?
    -Why we fuck? Why we fuck off?
Join us for a edgy exploration of how these important ideas intersect. Bring your taboo questions & leave all assumptions at the door.
events.print_description: Could True Love honor power & sex by holding these native drives sacred while including them in our developmental ascent? Join this edgy talk.

events.title: Morning Cocktails
events.description:
Morning Cock n' Tales is an interactive dome where you can come rest your feet after a long Night or Day on the Playa. Our specialty is morning Cocktails (think mimosas and palomas). We also have coffee for those not wanting to travel all the way to Center Camp and stand in the long lines. Besides our tasty beverages, we offer a welcoming atmosphere, comfortable seating, games, friendly conversations, and journals that we encourage guest to write (or draw) their TALES from the playa in. Each year the journals will make the annual journey home so they can added to and enjoyed again and again...
We open when the sun comes up (or whenever we feel like it), and stay serving most of the day (or until we are sick of it), always providing a place for weary burners to rest throughout the day and then kicking up the party at night.

events.title: Tribal Tantra w/Eugene Hedlund @ RhythmWave
events.description: We will warm up with Movement Meditation to arrive in our bodies and listen to the wisdom within. As we dance, we will awaken the elemental spirits within our physical bodies as we invite that sacred tremor which frees our hearts to love to move us so that we may release that which has held us back and shed any limiting beliefs so that we may invite new gifts and possibilities into the empty space within. By embodying this ritual, we attune our body to tend toward our highest good while making space to step with clarity into what is next. Then we will offer the healing practice of Medicine Dance to melt some of the walls to giving and receiving that love within. From that place, we will dance in the cultivated energy of the tribe - a full wave to ground all the gifts, shake loose any layers ready to release and make even more space to be empowered to our birth right to love and be loved, starting with the Self.

events.title: The President's Burning Man Divorce Party
events.description: Come celebrate #DivorceEquality and #ConsciousUncoupling! Because same sex marriages are still NOT recognized in Australia, President had to relocate from her home in Melbourne to Nevada for six weeks to get divorced from her ex-wife that she married in NYC.  Toast a glass of champagne to the darker side of Marriage Equality-- THE RIGHT TO DIVORCE! Thanks for joining us on this special day, and this is a black and white affair, because Divorce Equality is still a totally GREY AREA.  President loves a good party, so she will keep hosting a Burningman Divorce Party until all gay couples around the world can share in the right to Divorce!  If you have recently “uncoupled”, please join us in celebrating your freedom.

events.title: Divine Masculine & Divine Feminine Healing Circle
events.description:
Want to HEAL the rift between the Masculine and Feminine? In yourself and in humanity? Men create the outer ring - witnessing. Women are inside - receiving. Love transforms all.

'The Divine Masculine and Feminine Healing Circle' is an event where the men of the playa are invited to step into their higher selves, and consciously hold the energy of the Divine Masculine. Josie Posie leads a ceremony where the women of the playa welcome the men lovingly at the entrance to the dome, inviting them to match the high vibration they hold. The dome becomes an Ancient temple space. The men then stand in a circle offering unconditional love and healing to the community of women who gather in the center. The women come for healing their trust of the Masculine and to receive their love. This is a hands-off workshop. There is no touching except optional hugging at the end. 

When men show up and become the pure presence of their Divine Masculine nature and truly witness them, then women can relax into their loving Divine Feminine nature and fully become that love. As both polarities do this, we transmute cultural wounds in the collective feminine and masculine for all of humanity, co-creating a needed and beautiful new balance.
events.print_description: Want to HEAL the rift between the Masculine and Feminine? In yourself and in humanity? Men create the outer ring -witnessing. Women are inside -being.

events.title: Healing Foot Wash
events.description:
Come sit in our comfy chairs and relax for the best foot wash you've ever been given.  We supply everything needed. Bring your dusty feet and smile.

For the fourth year in a row Healing Foot Wash is coming again to Burning Man!  Find us on Rod's Road and take a load off your feet for a few minutes.  We follow a simple 4 step process:
1) Diluted vinegar to neutralize the alkaline dusty pH
2) Diluted Dr. Bronner's soap to release the dust
3) Pure water rinse
4) Dry feet and apply foot lotion

Sit and enjoy the attention in our open shade structure and chat for a while.  We're totally family friendly and welcome participation in foot washing.

Our 1 rule:
You can only wash feet after you've had your feet washed.

Come by and say hi! :)

events.title: Experience Deep Time on the Playa Bike Tour
events.description: This is your opportunity to contemplate Deep Time while on the playa. Your journey will be led by geology experts Drs. Elizabeth Miller (Stanford U) and John Dilles (Oregon SU).  Bike to the outer playa to contemplate the history of this place we call home, from the deep time geologic framework to the ice ages, first human inhabitants in the region, post-glacial warming and the raw chant and inexorable warming of the Anthropocene era.  Burn baby burn!  P.S. Deep Time = Geologic Time.

events.title: STOP MAKING SENSE - Talking Heads Movie Night!
events.description: We know you want to lay around in our swamp or dance around our fire to some Talking Heads out on the playa this year...and projector + speaker = basically David Byrne live on the playa. Join us for one of the best "rockumentaries" (dumb word) of all time:  "David Byrne walks onto the stage and does a solo "Psycho Killer." Jerry Harrison, Tina Weymouth and Chris Frantz join him for two more songs. The crew is busy, still setting up. Then, three more musicians and two back-up singers join the band. Everybody sings, plays, harmonizes, dances, and runs. They change instruments and clothes. Bryne appears in the Big Suit. The backdrop is often black, but sometimes it displays words, images, or children's drawings. The band cooks for 18 songs, the lyrics are clear, the house rocks. In this concert film, the Talking Heads hardly talk, don't stop, and always make sense." (thanks IMDB!)
events.print_description: Comfy-cozy & dancey-wansy movie night w/projector + speaker = basically Talking Heads live on playa. Be comfy by our fire, cozy in our swamp or DANCE!

events.title: Apothakary Pharmakon by Liminal Labs
events.description:
“We practice what we leech,” 5&F

Calling all disciples of experience and burnt Burners! The Liminal Apothakary Pharmakon is thy primo source for all things mat’ria medica, as determined by our staff of doubtfully artful Plague Doctors, Barber Surgeons, and Sinister Sisters schooled in the non-curative arts and doctrine of signatures.

Bringeth out thy almost-dead and try our all legal, possibly effective elixirs, tonics, stimulants, and placebos.* We’ll humor thy Humours and purify thy souls** with a selection of compounds from melancholy black bile to sanguine sweet blood. Witch-testing and disposal, vials and poisons may be offered for an extra cost, dependent on practitioner’s interest or whim or in consultation with internal voices.

– Approved by the Worshipful Society of Apothakaries and the Guild of Pepperers –

* Smalleth print: all “treatment” subject to accepted insurance. In keeping with local regulations, the Liminal Apothakary Pharmakon shall no longer releaseth evil spirits via a drilled hole in thy head.

** Soul purification not guaranteed. We apologize for any inconvenience.

events.title: GGG: Dominatrix for Dummies w/Eleanor O’Brien
events.description: By turns raunchy, hilarious and heartwarming, “GGG: Dominatrix for Dummies” is Eleanor O’Brien’s (Dance Naked Productions) solo show about training to be a dominatrix in New York City.  Deliciously funny and unabashedly graphic, O’Brien portrays an unforgettable cast of sex workers and clients.  Far from a simple guide to whips and chains, there is a love story woven into the fabric of the S&M adventure.   From the agony of junior high dances to the inner sanctum of a professional dungeon, enemas to ecstatic dance (including a cameo from Gabrielle Roth), GGG: D4D explores what it means to fall in lust with yourself!

events.title: Solar Playa International Happy Hour
events.description:
Solar Burners! You’re invited to a clean energy summit at Burning Man 2016!

Please join Black Rock Solar on Tuesday, August 30, 2016 for the on-playa happy hour for burners working in, wanting to work in, or just friends of, the solar industry: SOLAR PLAYA INTERNATIONAL (SPI). We will be serving cool libations. Chat about the future of solar and how to revolutionize the world’s energy supply while sipping a cool beverage.

What: SPI - Black Rock Solar's 7th annual playa happy hour event
Where: Everywhere Pavilion / ARTery, on the Esplanade at 6:15
When: Tuesday, August 30, 4-6pm
Who: All are welcome!

Featuring:
- Hobnobbin' with burners working in renewable energy, climate change, art,
sustainability and environmental policy
- Cool libations & playa munchies
- Black Rock Solar crew, staff and board members

events.title: Burning Man Ultramarathon
events.description:
What: The Seventh Annual Burning Man Ultramarathon.

How: Pull on your running sneakers, grab a bottle of water or hydration pack, your favorite energy snacks, and hit the playa for one of the most unique and insane 50ks out there. Wear whatever you love best while running – whether that’s a tutu, sports bra and tights, or nothing at all.

Where: Black Rock City (Nevada – exact location info here)

When: Tuesday, August 30th, 2016, 5 a.m.

Who: You! Burners and ultrarunners of all types!

Why: Because it’s fun. Because it’s insane. Because it’s the ultimate high. Because you want to challenge yourself. Because we are working on really rad finishers’ presents! Because the race is a party! Because you don’t mind people chasing after you with bottles of whiskey while you run!

What else: Pink Lightning Camp will be the race headquarters, start, finish, and aid station. Stop by to view the big map, results, ask questions, use our foam rollers and running sticks, or just hang out with some friendly folks. During the race, we’ll have cocktails, fun, music, and lots of cheering. Have your friends come to the healthiest party on the playa! Come on by to volunteer, hang out, pace, or run!
events.print_description:
Come & run 50k (31 miles) around the playa for the funnest running ever!

Register on Mon if possible. Bring a gallon of water & snack to share!

events.title: Rule trading, making and printing
events.description:
Medieval Germany is known for the stories collected by Brothers Grimm, the Hanse trading company, people obeying to the rules of their kings, and
Gutenbergs art of printing. All of these attributes are reflected in the G.E.R.M.A.N. guild workshop. This workshop is about rule making and printing. Following a playful structure, a personal rule of life and/or behavior is told and traded for a new rule, which is chosen or created by chance. To make this new rule a temporary or permanent part of the participants life, he or she can print this rule on pieces of old German files, badges, wristbands or even body parts.
events.print_description: It's time to give and receive guidance for your life. Let fate (and our shiny judge) decide, and create yourself a personal permanent reminder.

events.title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Eugene @ RhythmWave
events.description: 5Rhythms is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed! It’s a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirements are a body that is still breathing, a mind that is still curious, and a heart that is still beating. All are invited to join Eugene Hedlund on the bamboo at RhythmWave!
events.print_description: 5Rhythms is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed! All are invited to join Eugene Hedlund on the bamboo at RW.

events.title: DUST-ed
events.description: DUST-ed is a new educational program presented by PlayaSkool, the co-founders and creators of TEDxBlackRockCity.  Have you ever really fucked something up but learned a shit ton from the experience?  Startups, projects, businesses, relationships . . . we all take it in the kisser sometimes.  Quite often, these "interruptions" can lead to amazing breakthroughs in business, life and relationships.  We want to focus on some of the biggest and most amazing stories from within the Black Rock City community where citizens overcame adversities only to thrive in the the wake of failure.  Come and SHARE with us!

events.title: Open Dungeon Play
events.description: Playfully Yours is now a Village with 4 camps. Playfully Yours Dungeon is a play space for you to learn and experience sensation play in our well-equipped dungeon. We encourage beginners, intermediates and those curious about BDSM play to come, learn, and experience in a safe, non-pressured, and supervised environment. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we focus on the lighter, softer, and more sensual side of BDSM. Our personnel are available to provide instructions and demonstrations on the safe use of the equipment and will supervise play or can help facilitate play.  We’ll also have an outdoor dungeon play area equipped with a double St Andrews Cross, spanking bench, and stock. We also have a lounge area where you can relax and meet our campmates if you are over 21 years old with id. The lounge has a spanking bike, a corn hole bean bag game, lounge chairs, a mini bar serving cherry bombs, and a spinning wheel to facilitate participation. In Mist’R Cool’s Camp you can have the Cool Mist Experience with a fully automated misting booth, try to put together oversized 3D and 2D puzzles, show off with a 10’ dance pole, and experience the Cool Massage with a new and advanced sensual massager. Come for a private intimate portrait session in Bare Naked Tramps Portrait Studio. Individuals, couples, and groups are all welcome. Relax and enjoy great company in the exquisitely decorated Marshmallow Lounge. There will be libations for your pleasure and theme nights get dressed up for such a James Bond 007 party. Check other listings as we also offer daily classes and events.

events.title: Feldenkrais Workshop w/Shara Ogin @ RhythmWave
events.description: Free yourself from all the aches and pains of the week, restore your body's inner symmetry and alignment, and restore yourself for the weekend! The Feldenkrais Method emphasizes the connection between the mind, body, and spirit. It helps with blood flow, the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints, and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. Be prepared to lay down, relax and attune to yourself as Shara guide’s you through gentle, simple movement sequences guaranteed to shift your nervous system to a place of greater serenity, comfort, and joy. Please bring a mat or blanket if you have one.

Check the schedule daily on-site and come expand your mind daily in our huge DangerTent, complete with a sofa, stuffed animals, pillows, inflatable mattresses and crash space, and up to two hours each day of great conversation, advice, and insight! Here's the tentative speaker lineup:

Monday: Mike Maturo on legalization
Tuesday: Ian Karmin on BDSM and bondage
Wednesday:  Roc Morin on dreams, dream interpretation, and how to lucid dream
Thursday:  Tyler Hutchinson on genetics
Friday: Leon Feingold on polyamory

events.title: Hechi-Ken Hamazaki / Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD
events.description: Art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. This performance was inspired by and arranged from traditional Japanese tea ceremony. The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please simply drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thoughts inward for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me. Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- is always a great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy. I'll be happy if we could find any great idea to make a brighter, better, and more enjoyable future through this tea ceremony.
events.print_description: Art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. This performance was inspired by and arranged from traditional Japanese tea ceremony.

events.title: Socially Appropriate Menstruation Day
events.description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—you don't have to be embarrassed just because you have a naturally occurring blood flow. Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!
events.print_description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—skip the pad and tampon for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Let the blood make its artistic mark!

events.title: Yoga & Gong
events.description: Magic happens when there is no separation between the gong, the player and the listener. Join us for restorative session for your body and mind that combines yin yoga postures, with a gong sound bath. This healing workshop welcomes all levels. Bring a map or towel, leave with your body feeling open and easier to move, with a blissful mind.
events.print_description: There is no separation between the gong, the yogi and the listener. Join us for a restorative session for your body & mind combining yoga & gong sound

events.title: Black ROCK (N-ROLL) City Happy Hour
events.description: Tired of the playa's never ending EDM, dubstep, trance and techno? Longing to hear Bowie, Dylan and Skynyrd? Join us for some classic rock-n-roll and our speciality: swamp juice (aka cheap green champagne) while supplies last!
events.print_description: Tired of dubstep, trance & techno? How about some Bowie, Dylan & Skynyrd! Join us for classic rocknroll + swampjuice (cheap champagne) till its gone!

events.title: The ten principles as rules for life?
events.description: Are the 10 principles of Burning Man senseful rules for our lives? Share your experiences, ideas, wishes and discuss limits and difficulties
events.print_description: Let's share our experiences with the 10 Principles of BM - can they form helpful rules for our default world life?

events.title: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
events.description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not for her or him. Today it's okay to have just woken up in the morning, okay to be stimulated by your own silky boxers, and okay to be TURNED ON, because you have a right to your feelings and you get to do whatever you want with your body.
events.print_description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on!

events.title: The Greatest Mutant Arts Parade
events.description: The Greatest Mutant Arts Parade will launch its third test run on an improvised route through Black Rock City and the Playa as Mutant Art Vehicles unite to celebrate the unique and diverse spectacle that is Burning Man.  The goals of the Greatest Mutant Arts Parade (GMAP) is to create a future planned route event...where Black Rock City can unite together in an uncensored, magnificent Meet and Greet of Mutant Art Vehicles, Theme Camps, BORG Organizers, Art Groups, Marching bands, Bicycle Crews, Stilt Walkers, and much much more.  Look for the parade on its rogue route around Noon on the Playa, through the City...where???  We cannot tell you.  But we will at one point drive past 3:45 and along the Esplanade as each vehicle is given the respect of introduction.  ****All interested participant vehicles and people who would like to assist...then ride in the parade...contact us via email.
events.print_description: Mutant Art Vehicles join together and parade through the streets of BRC...to celebrate the unique and diverse spectacle that is Burning Man!

events.title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
events.description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
events.print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

events.title: Socially Appropriate Yawn Day
events.description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today. That's right—celebrate one of the great mammalian mysteries and let out a big old yawn even when someone is talking right at you. No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!

events.title: Bioelectric Ecstatic Touch
events.description:
Muster strength and courage to surrender your resistance to pleasure sensitivity. 
Come to a safe space of surrender and explore how to activate and discover your most powerful pleasure centers with your clothes completely on (or off if you really insist).We tend to think of our most sensitive spots as our genitals, but the truth is the entire body is a pleasure center and the skin is the conductor of this pleasure train. The crazy part is you don't even need to touch bare skin to experience an amazing sense of surrender, pleasure, and relaxation. Bring your friend or partner or get paired up with a beautiful playa temporary stranger (probably the coolest way to do this). Be prepared to experience sensual bliss that can serve as the best foreplay possible or just be a friendly touch to excite the body. with Eric Brief
events.print_description: Muster strength and courage to surrender your resistance to pleasure sensitivity.

Give a motorboat, get a motorboat. With consent, anything goes!

events.title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Visudha @ RhythmWave
events.description: Make it Good. VisudhaBuddha believes that endings can be bittersweet, and the way HOME, is to make it Good. Your week on the playa has been full & rich, possibly even messy & beautiful, crazy in good or not so good ways. In the 5Rhythms we will find the pulse of the Mother, the beat of your own heart, and the music of your soul meeting in the unity of one Tribe: we remember and breath the rhythm of Life together. Joining in patterns and repetitions—one dance, one motion, one wave of energy—we come home to ourselves, each other, our home on the playa, and the essence of pure love. Leave Black Rock City with love and your family firmly embodied in your heart. Make an ending you will always remember. Please join RhythmWave and Visudha de los Santos as we close the week and our 10 years at Burning Man with a 5Rhythms celebration of movement, reflection, and spirit.
events.print_description: Make it good. VisudhaBuddha believes that endings can be bittersweet, and the way HOME, is to make it Good. All are welcome as we wrap 2016 at RW.

events.title: Dance of Liberation
events.description:
Ritual shamanic celebration- movement therapy to heal and free physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages. 
 through dance, breathwork. The workshop begins with a ritual purification, connecting heart, body, mind, and spirit.

experience ritual celebration in movement therapy that heals and frees physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages through dance, breathwork, and contemporary Shamanism. The workshop begins with a ritual purification, connecting heart, body, mind, and spirit. Then it moves you into a deeper state of consciousness and closer to your individual and collective soul’s purpose. Utilizing dance, contemporary shamanism, hands on healing, drumming and global music, this powerful and beautiful soul work sheds inhibitions and heightens inner awareness in a safe and carefully monitored group setting. Dancers are blindfolded in the shamanic tradition and step beyond their conscious fears and limitations to allow their innermost creative sides to break free. with Dina T

30 seats available and first come first served. Don’t worry about the dishes either - it’s a traditional Kamayan feast which means you eat with your hands! Smell, touch, taste, and love this one of a kind experience. Mabuhay!

events.title: Dying with time to spare: A nomad's journey home
events.description:
A deep dive into death, suffering and challenging fate through simple physical practices - opening the heart and accepting what life has to give.
In many cultures death is seen as the unknown, the point at which it is difficult to determine what happens next. Will death be the end of life? The pain experienced in the lead-up to death or the manner death is portrayed may have lasting impressions on how we determine our own death. If death is a passage and a natural step, like a leaf that falls and disintegrates into the earth, how do we best prepare to be ready, at a moments notice to fall onto earth, without a shred of remorse, guilt or unpacked potential? This workshop is about giving yourself a chance to look deeper into death with a clean slate. Determine your own method to prepare for death and live life with an openness to dying. The heart-opening exercises are done alone, and with the group using resonance tuning, energy-centering and creative visualisation. Raise your consciousness!  with Tia Kansara
events.print_description: A deep dive into death, suffering and challenging fate through simple physical practices - opening the heart and accepting what life has to give.

events.title: Rise & Shine Salutation Yoga
events.description:
Start your day out right by joining us at Huggzilla for a sunrise yoga session with Benji!

Greet the sun as it warms and nourishes both you and the earth simultaneously. Become one with the sequence of harmony that envelops and awakens both earth and body. Learn to be the generator of your own inner peace through a physical connection to the earth by focusing body and mind.

Enhance your muscular strength and body flexibility, promote and improve respiratory and cardiovascular function, promote recovery from and treatment of addiction, reduce stress, anxiety, depression, and chronic pain, improve sleep patterns, and enhance your overall well-being and quality of life.

Length: 60min
Level: Intermediate

*Sun Greeting - Sun Salutation sequence
*Art of Letting Go - Grounding Exercises
*Yoga Poses - From the Ground Up
events.print_description: Start your day out right by joining us for Sunrise Yoga with Benji! Become one with the sequence of harmony that envelops & awakens earth and body.

events.title: Renoardo's Artisan Menagerie
events.description:
We are a group of artisans who travel incognito while instructing others in the fine art of making masks, anatomy illustration, & other indulgences. We have our own metal stamp label that we use to "mark" our handiwork.Our masks are the finest in the region & our artists have the flare of Leonardo.

In the spirit of Carnivale, our menagerie started creating masks & providing instruction on how to create them. As our group increased, so did our artisan base to include painters & sketch artists. We plan to have classes in making & decorating masks along with art classes in anatomy & anything inspiring to those attending.We will have live models to help with inspiration.We will have a plexiglas panel for instruction and colouring.

Art classes will be held daily ranging from anatomy to landscapes, with live models or use of the plexiglas wall as a template.

The Plexiglas wall will be available at all times with markers to color on one side while the design is created on the other.A participant can take a picture of the creation to later print and add to their coloring book.


Our Artisan Menagerie is thrilled to provide the joy of creative expression mixed with various mediums from plexiglas to foam to paper.
events.print_description: We are a group of artisans who travel incognito while instructing others in the fine art of making masks, anatomy illustration, & other indulgences.

events.description: Don our red/cyan 3-D glasses and view the world in a new light! Our resident anaglyph photographer  invites you see depth and realism in what appear to be flat photographic prints. Our prolific and fecund photog invites you to gaze beyond the flat of the land to more pregnant sights. It’s so real! He has images on 2-D paper that will protrude into your mind and fertilize your imagination. Cited techniques will be available so that you can do it yourself at home, using a digital camera and photo software, and don't forget to take a free pair of viewers with you (while supplies last!)

events.description:
Psycho-physical awakening exercises from different traditions to feel out her vibratory field.

Open yourself to the possibility of living the paradox of being joyfully alive in this tangible realm we live in while at the same time being liberated and awakened in this body.  We as humans are microcosms of this universe, whatever exists in the outer universe also exists within. Feel the vibrations of this tangible Earth we live in knowing that everything is in motion and nothing rests. Tantra is a system so intuitive and natural to human kind that its essence can be seen within all spiritual paths from the Celtic, African, Native American, Sufi, esoteric Christian, Hindu, Sound Healing, Kabbalah, Buddhist, and Taoist wisdom traditions. It is a set of spiritual practices and ritualistic actions that through personal effort and experimentation are designed to direct universal energies of the macrocosm into the practitioner to achieve total liberation from ignorance and suffering. In this workshop we will use a myriad of psycho-physical exercises learned from different traditions for modifying and exploring consciousness. We will feel the energy of the Earth and learn to appreciate this vibratory field we exist in. with Ashleigh Rojas
events.print_description: Psycho-physical awakening exercises from different traditions to feel out her vibratory field.

events.title: The Arts of Buon Fresco Revealed
events.description:
Hi everyone, come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We humbly invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Welcome to the Burning Man Guild Workshops! For the first time ever, Burning Man is hosting a series of workshops in a Florentine piazza-style format to have Masters of various craftsmanship skills teach our students the arts of the Renaissance. 

We, The Three Faced (Stone) Wench Workshop/Guild, are offering a series of classes you would love to attend! 

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various actual old time techniques over several days to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. As part of our commitment to up-cycle, we will utilize and recycle actual (old foam insulation) building materials. Participants will learn to recreate various historical stone mixtures that compromise the the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. This artifact creation will be followed by (and applied) techniques to 'age' their artwork with the patina and craquelure of passing time. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes their momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Plastered Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!

That’s not all! 

We are offering a unique community project/event, and we invite everyone to participate with your hearts (and energy): 

We are accomplishing a recreation of Gustav Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze (Ode To Joy), with a slight twist on the theme: “All You Need Is Love.” The secco fresco artwork will stretch across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida, and of our experiences at Burning Man. 

Please join us! ;o)

Youth ages 12 and up welcome.
events.print_description: Let’s get PLASTERED! Apprentices will learn Art of Fresco. Upon completion of a fresco block, they’ll be CERTIFIED Plastered Master of the Playa!

events.title: Listen the Fuck Up to Your Spirit Guides
events.description:
What the fuck is a spirit guide?     Find out how to walk in beauty, grace, and power by welcoming Father Jaguar, Mother Bear, and other plant and animal guides into your life.

barnaby;s: Get your head out of your default world arse and drop into  deep listening to surrender to your spirit guides.

What the fuck is a spirit guide, bro? Think of them as being like your guardian angels except way more badass. Get your head out of your default world arse and learn how to drop into a deep state of listening to connect with, surrender to, and listen the fuck up to your spirit guides. On any given day there is about a 100% chance that you're going to be doing some bullshit that you shouldn't be doing as a result of obstacles laid down by your subconscious. You're making baby elephant seals cry when you do that. Find out how to walk in beauty, walk in grace, walk in power by learning how to welcome Father Jaguar, Mother Bear, Uncle Eagle, Aunt Otter and many more into your life. Need to find a medicine man/woman/circle in your area? The session will end with shamanic networking session so that you can find and connect with healers off-playa to aid you in realizing your true nature. with Matt King

events.title: Longevity Stick
events.description: The sun’s just up, but not too hot; clothing is optional here, so adults only, please. Come for a not too early hour of low-impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 low-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, and vitality, and open your points and channels. Bring your water or hydration liquid. We’ll provide sticks for you. Master Mai Bac Dao developed Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of war of the North Vietnamese. He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain health through LSA, and vowed if he was ever freed, he’d dedicate his life to spread its benefits, with the proviso that no trainer could ever charge for it. (Like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, moved to Southern California, and taught classes of students and future teachers. Today, weekly classes abound in So Cal, around the US, and the world. See: www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 .
events.print_description: Sun’s up, not too hot, but clothes R optional. It’s a low-impact exercise to add balance, open points, channels. Bring H2O. We’ll provide the sticks!

events.title: Movie Mirror Camera Obscura by Liminal Labs
events.description:
Liminal Labs Workshop is fustian to announce a breakthrough advance in the art of Camera Obscura. Utilizing our Movie Mirror Obscura technology, what wast once restricted to the dark isolation of a head-sized box or a stuffy, lightless chamber, is anon a shared, open-air experience under the stars themselves. Thrill to see actual, illuminate images of people, places, and things (things!!!) that seem to move with a divine direction of their own making.

Leonardo daVinci was himself taken with the possibilities of the Camera Obscura. Inspired, Liminal Labs Workshop does the Master one better by adding focused, intense illumination on a 53-foot white wall to offer an experience beyond what even Leonardo might imagine.

Indeed, the Movie Mirror Obscura dual screen system shines brighter than the heavens and is blended with sounds to tempt the dancing angels. From Tuesda through Friday, each evening’s dark of night brings, not one, but two images magically mirrored, side-by-side for thy Royal amusement. Prithee shaketh thy booty if so moved. Or sit and enjoy the movie magic.

Themes may run from sweet, to spicy, maybe a bit salty... so the crazy ultramarathon runners (and non-runners) at Pink Lightening camp will be serving up suitably-themed cocktails: one sweet, one spicy, and one salty at all times. events.title: PaintingWallofGreenPeaceEvolves
events.description:
We will have 10 pre-stretched and heavy duty canvases that are 3'x4' tiled together to create a 30' x4' artists playground. We will supply all water based acrylic paints in an array of colors. We will supply all brushes and artist knives. We will have palate mixing available as well as ample water and rags to assist you in color changes. We will maintain the entegraty of this project and make sure there is everything you need to get lost in your own world of art expression. We will have satellite radio for your listening pleasure and will keep the wall lit for several hours at night too! And the end of the event we will disassemble the wall and randomly distribute the finished canvases. These rare gifts will each hold the work of hundreds of passing artists who will have combined to create the memory of BRC 2016!!!
AND...while you are there and if you dare, Thomas delFuego will let you choose a Rune from his pile of hand painted Runes. These stones on 10,000 year old sand concretions and will speak to your heart and that very moment:):):) Come join Thomas and Darma delFuego and become our friends for life!

events.description: Transformational Dance combines hypnosis, energy work and movement to deepen practitioners relationships to themselves and music, allowing one to use music and movement as a tool for transformation. This workshop will focus on releasing any obstacles or resistance to the expression of participants authentic self. Transform, heal, expand, as you express your true nature through movement.

events.title: Life Coaching Workshop
events.description:
We all have negative traits that come out under certain circumstances at work. Whether it’s when we’re stressed, worried, overwhelmed, or, the new age old favorite, when Mercury is in retrograde. Right? Except, no matter what, no matter how warranted it feels in the moment, our bad behaviors never leave us proud of ourselves.

Righteous? Check. Justified? Check. Proud? No.

What would be possible, if by the end of 2016, you had your bad behaviors under new management? Wouldn’t you have a totally different experience at work? Wouldn’t you be more impressed with yourself? Wouldn’t it be worth it? Wouldn’t you be proud?

Check.

Come learn how to nix your negative traits, and get fighting for the right team, your dreams team!
events.print_description: Nix your negative traits! What if you got your bad behaviors under new management? Wouldn't you be proud? Would it be worth it? Come learn how.

events.title: Life Coaching Workshop
events.description:
What if true happiness and self-esteem come from knowing you can count on yourself to keep a promise to yourself? That making and keeping promises to yourself about what matters most to you, matters most. From eating kale (the state bird of California) to having consistent (and great) sex with your mate to exercising to writing.

It does.

It’s time to get your head out of the game! 
It certainly is not on your dream’s team. We can help.

events.title: SHAMANIC BODYWORK to Destroy Your Demons
events.description:
2Man guides you to clear dark forces that haunt your body, mind, and spirit. Heal yourself to heal the world.
 
Body, mind, and spirit are all flip sides of the same three-sided coin (spirit counts as a side). We store psychological and spiritual traumas in our bodies and many of us are unsure how to unwind knots that exist on multiple levels. Experienced shamanic practitioner and bodyworker 2Man will guide a group session that guides us through the initial stages of practicing shamanic bodywork. Learn how to get centered in Spirit before starting a session, how to recognize the energetic and physical traumas your subject is carrying, and body/energy/spirit work for destroying the demons that haunt your body, mind, and spirit.  with 2man-Matt King

We make way for our hearts to expand and love on ourselves as well as one other. Let us cultivate what it is to be raw and to be human. Let us manifest light into our world that brings hope for restoration.

Grounding in with Mother Earth, we will find ourselves in a peaceful meditation that prepares our inner being for the present moment.

events.title: Procession Of The Ceremonial Flame
events.description: Fire that has been extracted from the sun, drummed and danced around, and has been burning all week long will be transferred from El Diabla to the Luminferous. The Procession of the Ceremonial Flame will proceed to the Great Circle where the largest convergence of fire performers, the Fire Conclave, will be gifted with that same fire to start their dances dedicated to the Man before it is released in pyrotechnic delight.

events.title: Burner Toastmasters Speak-A-Thon and Get Together
events.description:
Like to speechify? Pontificate? Step up to ye olde soap box? We’ve got you covered. While there's some jargon in the notes below that our wannabe’s might not understand, we assume the Toastmasters folks will get it. And you will soon! Note:
Bring your TI Magazine and we’ll take pics over at the Man! If you’re a Toastmaster and couldn’t be in Washington, DC, for their August International Convention, then bring your CC/CL/other manuals you’d like to advance in, and join us (with friends) for a real Toastmasters meeting - and some photos! We plan to cram in speeches, evaluations, and table topics into a one hour session, or more if demand exists for it, so on time is a good thing. Prompt arrivals will have the best chances for the most fun and credit.
Looking to join in? Pepperland theme camp, Tuesday, 1-2PM.  Email: Gerflash (at) socal (dot) rr (dot) com. so we can plan ahead and count you in.
Just maybe - the pix we take might make it into the TI Magazine! You’ll actually be Toastmastering on-Playa!
events.print_description: We’re back, so let’s do it again! Are U a Toastmaster? Bring your manual, friends. A wannabe? Join us for a great meet-up, photos, and fond memories!

events.title: Soulistica Sunset Kava Ceremony
events.description:
Soulistica hosts special Kava ceremonies at Sunset every day during events. These ceremonies provide grounding and a smooth transition into the night's festivities. 

A well prepared Kava potion drunk in small quantities produces only pleasant changes in behavior. It is therefore a slightly stimulating drink which helps relive great fatigue.  It relaxes the body after strenuous efforts, clarifies the mind and sharpens the mental faculties.

Come join Soulistica in honoring the Sun and Kava while we exchange knowledge and stories!

Soulistica will be hosting a Kava ceremony Monday-Friday 8:30-9:00pm

events.title: See Your Light, Love Your Light- True Reflections
events.description:
A True Reflections Palace - showcasing mirrors that do not reverse left and right!

Come see the sparkle in your eyes from the light in your soul.  These mirrors reflect you as you are, not reversed, and are truly magical!  

Theres both science and an art here - your face "works" when you see it as it truly is.  In contrast it stops working, and you tend to stare at yourself in mirrors. Then get self-critical all too often. Even if you are feeling wonderful, like all so many times at Burning Man, a mirror doesn't reflect it naturally, so you tend to lose that sparkle and start to question your good feelings.  

In contrast, when you look in one of these true reflection mirrors, your face keeps working!  Your eyes, which have so much beautiful information in them, continue to have that same information that you can see.  This is what we see and read so well when we look at you.  That sparkle when you are happy, that depth when you are being deep, that vitality and genuineness that we know about you, now you can see it too!  So easy to believe in yourself when you see all that true energy you have. 

The result?  Expect to be absolutely floored.  You are an amazing creature - a Human Being, and now you can see what that really looks, and feels like.  The feedback loop you find yourself in now is clear and complete, so smiles look like real smiles and you will smile back.  Complete with sparkle!!! Beautiful!

There's lots of posters in the Palace (which is made from giant tinker style toys) to explain it all.  If you don't see the magic, ask one of us for a demo and explanation. .. we want to get you to your own AHA moment!   

Note-this is the same Palace that has been under the Man, on Playa, on Esplanade and in Center Camp!  Don't Miss It - Its Magic!
events.print_description: Come see for yourself the Sparkle in your Eyes from the Light in your Soul.  These True Reflection mirrors reflect you as you are. Truly magical!
