events.title: Yellow Submarine Viewing Party and Sing-A-Long!
events.description: Do you like to sing? Do you like The Beatles? Step right this way! Roll up for our Mystery Tour! One night only! Wear your grooviest duds that show off your spirit of the 60’s and take a trip in our Yellow Submarine as we gaze upon The Beatles 1968 voyage through Pepperland! Enjoy refreshments while you watch the movie with fellow fans! Harmonize with The Beatles during the movie and attend our after party in our Karaoke sing-a-long!   Come for the movie; stay for the vocal jam. - Some years ago on the Playa, we had a total blast when a spontaneous chorus broke out in our camp, covering classic songs, and an annual tradition was born. We’re updating that tradition as we gather this year to sing timeless Beatles tunes with/without accompaniment. Everyone’s invited and welcomed! It ain’t over ’til it’s over!
events.print_description: Wear your grooviest 1960s duds! It’s a 1968 Yellow Submarine trip with The Beatles thru Pepperland! Refresh while U view and sing. Karaoke bash after!

events.title: Life Coaching Workshop
events.description:
Did you ever notice that you and Al Roker (the weatherman) sound a lot alike?  For example, he says, “tomorrow it’s going to rain; for the next five days it’ll be hot & muggy”.  And, you say things like, “today sucked and I’m a procrastinator”, or “I’m not a morning person”, you know, “I’m cloudy with a chance of a storm”…as if you have nothing to do with it, it’s just how you and it is…

But doesn’t weather reporting yourself into “not a morning person,” just gives you a doctor’s note from being nice until noon?

We are all sneakily weather reporters in our lives, pretending we have no say over how we are going to be or how things are going to go.  But what if it’s not so?

Uh oh is right. What if you are actually the author of your life?  

I mean, who else is?  In this workshop, you’ll begin to redefine a new and powerful context from which to run your personal and professional life, where you have a say over the weather.
events.print_description: Begin to redefine a new and powerful context from which to run your personal and professional life, where you have a say over the weather.

events.title: Transcending Fear Workshop
events.description:
An existential exploration of Fear and EGO. Come learn how fear and our essential state of being work in a dynamic relationship to create our EGO (impulsive actions, and self-defeating beliefs and habits). In this workshop, we will touch on the basic understanding of fear and it's differentiation from Worry, Anxiety, and False Fear. Then dive deep into existentialism explaining why fear has such a programmable hold on our free will, and biology, causing our impulsive actions and thoughts. Then we will explore techniques I've used to transcend my own fears, self-defeating beliefs and habits, freeing myself from years of insecurity, blame, resentment, childhood abuse, guilt from molestation, and general self-hate. I will share every method that has worked for me, and then afterword we will have a Q&A, and have a fun conversation and share our experiences. 

About Me: Hello my name is Nine Johnson, I'm a Performance Anxiety coach in Los Angeles California. I usually work with Actors, Singers, Athletes, Directors and businesses people from all industries to identify and overcome their performance anxieties, insuring confidence and peak performance. I come from a spiritual and self development background with over 15 years experience, in counseling, and life coaching.
events.print_description: An existential exploration of fear & EGO. Explore ways to transcend fear, resentment, anger, and guilt by fear mapping & changing habitual beliefs.

events.title: College Football Tailgate & Viewing Party
events.description:
Kickoff the Man Burn by watching your favorite teams play on our three portable screens - we added one! This event has been a blast the last few years. Join us to celebrate the start of the season...bring some food & drinks to share...never graduate!

We'll begin the day by watching:
- 9:00 Hawaii at Michigan...wear your colors & Go Blue!
- 9:00 Oklahoma at Houston
[If the Michigan game is a blowout, then we may be able to show some of the Rutgers at Washington game at 11:00 am...we will at least show the 2nd half.]

At mid-day, the focus shifts to:
- 12:30 UCLA at Texas A & M
- 12:30 LSU at Wisconsin

Mid-afternoon, we'll show:
- 2:30 North Carolina at Georgia

The big late game will be:
- 5:00 USC vs Alabama
This game will end around 8:30 - 8:45...the Man Burn takes place at 9:30, so come prepared and be ready to bolt at the end of the game.

Bonus coverage:
- 6:00 Clemson at Auburn
This game will end as the Man Burn is underway...if you find a responsible fan, you may watch and shut down the Cafe.


Crazy, nutty bonus coverage on Sunday...hey, I don't make the schedule...we can only pray for a favorable outcome before the Temple Burn ;-)
- 4:30 Notre Dame at Texas

If you have a request for a particular college game, the management of the Harmonic Cafe will try to accommodate :-)
events.print_description: What...at BM?  Yes, it's a terrific party!  Kickoff the Man Burn by watching your favorite teams.  Bring some food + drinks to share.  Never Graduate!

events.title: Dark Side of the Moon Live Concert
events.description: Reverbia is proud to bring you a very special presentation of Pink Floyd's Dark Side of the Moon (full album) Live Music Concert!!  Under the Desert Night Stars, amidst the cosmic clouds of psychedelic humanity…the perfect blissful and vibrational setting for Floyd.  21 year old Rock/Indie Virtuoso Alexa Melo, honors this timeless legendary piece with her lead vocals and lead guitar…backed by a star studded cast of exceptional musical talent, including Michael Mowgli from The Mowglis on Rhythm Guitar, Christian Hand on drums...Tempe, AZ music icon Brett Hinders on keyboards, and Vir McCoy of Dogon Lights on Bass…along with other very special guests.  With the Interactive giant art globe The ORB (featured at the World's Fair in Paris) above the stage…in full light improvisational movement…this is a must see show…all cosmic Black Rock City Citizens will want to experience.
events.print_description: Reverbia presents Pink Floyd's Dark Side of the Moon (full album) Live Music Concert.  An All Star Cast of Reverbia Artists performs this Cosmic Piece

events.title: 30-Second Song Writing

Our guru here has written ten zillion songs herself, and she can teach you "30-second song writing,” too. One of her songs was recorded by Bruce Springsteen! She’ll help you release your inner Paul McCartney!

events.title: Burning Man Sustainability: Past, Present & Future
events.description: Curious how environmental stewardship and the evolution of Burning Man intertwine? Where is our environmental record now and what does our future hold? Join Rosalie Barnes, BM Manager, and Harley K. Dubois, Co-founder of the EGs, in conversation as they reflect.

events.title: Past, Present, Future Trivia
events.description: Hail and well-met, residents of the year 2015! How extensive is your knowledge of your past and your present? Do you think you know what your future holds? Bring yourself and your friends to TIME TRAVEL TRIVIA to compare your cerebral fact archive to that of the Time Colonists!

events.title: Solar re-charging

Since we will be up and running pre event, please feel welcome to come see us while you're building the city, for recharging needs. We recharge from cameras, cellphones to power tools, electric bikes and wheelchairs. We can't wait to meet you!

events.title: Lost Musicians of 2016 Tribute Concert
events.description: Reverbia Artists pay their honor to some of our greatest artistically musical talents who passed away in 2016.  The Concert will feature music and some sing alongs from: Bowie, Prince, Glenn Frey, and more.  This is an inaugural event for Reverbia as we hope to continue this Lost Artists Tribute Concert for years to come.  Artists performing will be: Michael Mowgli, Alexa Melo, Brett Hinders, Haley Johnson, Olivia de la Cruz, Kelsey Sprague, BRad Tidwell, Loving You, Quetzal Guerrero, Papa Bear, Leigh Jones, Gabriel Wolfchild, and more TBA.

events.title: UNICORN GLAMPEDE
events.description:
The collective noun for unicorns is a Fabulus of unicorns, not a blessing as the Internet will tell you. So come join The Fabulus Unicorns for a gathering of horns for a Glampede as we gallop across the Playa spreading the sparkle in a Rainbowgasm of fun, color and sexiness. 

Help us raise the vibration and of course make a nuisance of ourselves, stampeding through people's camps spreading our intolerably positive energy throughout the festival. Also learn about the 10 Principles of Unicornia: https://www.facebook.com/353058174771863/photos/?tab=album&album_id=934619463282395

events.description: Internal conflict? Head and Heart disagree? Clearly you need the drama of a courtroom (court-shade structure) to find resolution! You bring your conflict, and any witnesses that can shed light on it. A jury of your burner peers will hear the evidence and render a verdict for one side of you.

events.title: Yogoman @ Reverbia Live Nights
events.description: Reverbia is proud to return Yogoman to Reverbia Nights Live Main Stage.  Formally known as Yogoman Burning Band…(perhaps the band will re-add the latter of their former name for this one performance in Black Rock City)…this very popular festival headlining band from the NW can and will get Crazy!!!  Front vocalist and Drummer, Jordan Rain, continues to blend profound, with a wee on the silly side, lyrical content…complimenting their constant wiper blade booty shaking, funky/reggae dub beats style…which the band is now so famous for perfecting.  Bellingham hails this band as one of their favorite sons and Yogoman has toured festivals and show venues all across the West Coast...down, down into the Deep South, including their long stints on Bourbon Street in their favorite hub stop of New Orleans.
events.print_description: New Orleans inspired, Reggae Dub, Funky…Booty-all-over-the-place Dance Band w/ a full horn section…and a drummer lead vocalist…Dang Dey Be Dat Good!!!

events.description:
We're bringing the finest country club experience to Black Rock City! Relax in the comfort of our lawn chairs under the shade of the palm trees. Visit our wine bar to socialize with other high-class guests like yourself. If you're feeling energetic you can find a tee time at our challenging and memorable par-5 3-hole golf course. If you have any issues during your stay, our attentive staff and can help with any and all needs.

In terms of events, we'll have daily wine and cheese tastings at 9pm with the finest string cheeses, and canned cheeses paired with the most sought after wines cardboard boxes can deliver. Our talented playa sommeliers will guide our guests through a tasting experience and along with our fromagers lead a path to sensual nirvana. Honored guests to the Palm Tree Country Club will have the opportunity to personalize their own golf balls before teeing off on our 3-hole putt putt course, those personalized golf balls are then theirs to keep.
events.print_description: Hold onto your balls and enjoy our serene par 5 mini golf course all tee'd off with nightly wine tastings to lubricate the action

events.title: Geometrical Constructions
events.description:
The Rhombohedron Society is about  exploring the world of cubic symmetry. The lesson being taught by the Society is about the unifying properties of the rhombic dodecahedrton. This includes finding and learning about the how the lost triangle of Pythagoras defines the slopes of the faces of cubic polyhedra. 

Within the space are four areas. The primary workshop/classroom includes seating and work tables where visitors will learn about the Lost Triangle and make a Lost Triangle template to take with them. Visitors also will have the opportunity to learn more about geometry by assembling small scale models.

There will be a dome with built in seats and a transparent skin being used for 24/7 multi-media presentations, and the Gypsy Wagon and car “SV 3 Rose” all made in plywood with integral slotted and notched connections, more whimsical creations as if from the mind of Leonardo.
events.print_description: The Rhombohedron Society invites you to explore the world of cubic symmetry. Learn about the Lost Triangle of Pythagoras and the Rhombic Dodecahedron.

events.title: Laughter Yoga
events.description: Start your evenings with the most intense laughter you can experience. We laugh for no reason, other than for exercise, and health. Relieve stress and pain, promote natural healing, and create spontaneous bonds of friendship through group laughter. It’s fun! The brainchild of Dr. Madan Kataria in India and practiced by millions worldwide, Laughter Yoga combines Unconditional Laughter with Yogic Breathing (Pranayama). Anyone can Laugh for No Reason, without relying on humor, jokes or comedy. Laughter is simulated as a body exercise in a group; with eye contact and childlike playfulness, it soon turns into real and contagious laughter. “Inappropriate” Laughter Yoga is also a possibility, if our clientele are okay with it. The concept of Laughter Yoga is based on a scientific fact that the body cannot differentiate between fake and real laughter. One gets the same physiological and psychological benefits. Find much more info online by searching on Laughter Yoga, but come! Enjoy!
events.print_description: Laughter as exercise! Laugh with others in childlike playfulness; experience the health benefits of good, long, & pleasurable laughs with us! Healthy!

events.title: Healing and Intimacy— With Your Clothes ON
events.description:
"Learn to give and receive Thai Yoga bodywork, in which compassionate intention, energetic connection, and deep physical (but nonsexual) intimacy converge to produce a profound state of relaxation, rejuvenation and well-being. Bring a partner or find one there!
 
 Rhythmic movement and deep pressure help stimulate the body's own healing processes. The receiver remains clothed; no oils are used. 
 
 One partner receives while the other gives; halfway through the workshop we switch so that each gets a turn.
 
 We focus on the essential core elements of safe and effective bodywork: Intention, Connection, Safety, and Self-care. The Thai yoga bodywork sequence used is a slow-moving, simplified yet effective sequence. Poses can be modified as needed to accommodate individual differences. No prior yoga or bodywork experience needed!"
events.print_description:
"Learn Thai Yoga bodywork, healing through touch.
 Dance-like movement and deep nurturing contact stimulate the body's own healing processes."

events.title: Shamans of the Global Village - Film Screening
events.description: Indigenous people across the globe have used sacred plant medicines for millennia to heal, illuminate and connect them to the web of life. Each of these psychoactive medicines needs a healer to connect them to their patients: the shaman. This investigative-adventure documentary show examines not just these shamanic medicines, but the shamans that wield them. If, as Marshall McLuhan said, we are now a “global village”, then we need our own healers that understand the deep power and sacredness these plant medicines can reveal.  Film screening followed by Filmmakers Q&A session.
events.print_description: Come on a journey into the world of modern shamanism with Western practitioners and see never before filmed footage of ancient medicine practices.

events.title: Reverbia Interactive Live Music Art Wall Mural
events.description: Reverbia presents for the first time our Reverbia Interactive Live Music Art Wall Mural!  As our Live Music resonates through your ears, share your depths of perspective and emotion through the iterative expression of Art Wall Painting. Noted Canadian artist Danielle Caners, leads an expedition into the realms of unknown, improvised art, where only through the collective creative mind, can a masterpiece be discovered.  Daily and nightly, when the live music is playing, come share your artistic expression by painting upon our mural canvas wall.  Portions of Reverbia's Art Wall Mural will be painting between established lines, while other areas of the Art Wall Mural will be free formed expression.  *Note that the Reverbia Art Wall Mural will not be open 24 hours…but will operate throughout the day and night whenever our artist supervision  is available.  During Reverbia's concerts in the Shade Series and Reverbia Live Nights…the Art Wall Mural will be the most consistently available for public painting and expression.

events.title: Orgasmic Meditation for Women - What, Why & How
events.description: OM (orgasmic meditation) is a sequenced practice in which one partner gently strokes the other partner’s clitoris for 15 minutes. The result is said to be therapeutic, rather than sexual. The “stroking” activates the limbic system and releases a flood of oxytocin. The technique was originally billed as a spiritual-style practice like meditation, but as it gains popularity, it’s being presented as more of a “technological innovation” or “body-hack to happiness.” The “guru” of the technique, 46-year-old Nicole Daedone, guarantees that it’s profound whether you’re coupled or single.   This course will be strictly women and transfolks so that everyone can experience the electricity on both sides of the position.
events.print_description: Orgasmic Meditation is a partnered practice & we will be only women and transfolks.  Each woman can experience stroking & getting stroked!

events.title: Burner Family Feud
events.description: 100 burners were surveyed, the top answers are on the board. To see the results, join us at Burner Family Feud!  Form a team of five players and compete against other camps to see who wins the BFF (Burner Family Feud) Championship!

events.title: Chill Dome Till Dawn
events.description: When Reverbia Live Nights ends…The Chill Dome Till Dawn begins.  Come warm up your body, while your mind and soul journey into the depths of Cosmic Universe.  The Chill Dome Till Dawn is our featured interactive LED and Soundscape Experience, where lights move to sound and sound moves within your mind.  After Hours at Reverbia, The Chill Dome Till Dawn will present live instrumental deep chill ambient music layered upon multi track recordings of cosmic soundscapes.  Detach, Explore, Connect, Envision!!!  Artists are TBA for The Chill Dome Till Dawn.
events.print_description: When Reverbia Live Nights ends, The Chill Dome Till Dawn Begins.  Warm body and Soul inside this interactive LED and Soundscape Cosmic Experience.

events.title: Raw Honey Tastings from around the world!
events.description: From light to dark, runny to viscous to crystallized, raw honey embodies the diversity of communities around the world—one hive next to another has as different a personality ranging from relaxed and buzzy to aggressive and defensive.  Ann with an E and RamonaMayhem invite BRC BeePpl to the dHive bar to taste the ambrosia of the flowers and the trees produced by the honeybee. We also educate people on adulterated honey (over filtered, pasteurized, and HFCS added) and provide a sample of that as well.  Get your proboscis wet as we honey lovers stick together!  Easiest way to find the dHive bar is to look for our Do More Now 7 story fire building on 7:30 & Beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!  Bzzzz!
events.print_description: Wonder why honey is light, dark, runny, or viscous?  Come taste and find out many of nature's finest secrets from the only food we eat from an insect!

events.title: MOOPer Race
events.description: Let's bring back the days when Burners would race after MOOP caught in the wind!  We'll provide MOOP bags and send racers off to see who can collect the most MOOP, and award prizes for most collected, most interesting find, and more!
events.print_description: We'll provide MOOP bags and send racers off to see who can collect the most MOOP! Prizes awarded for most collected, most interesting find, and more!

events.title: Contraptionists Afternoon fire and ice parties
events.description:
Come enjoy Afternoon Fire Fries and SnowCones Parties.
Come in for one of our Contraptionists SnowCones, in a flavor of our choosing, for your enjoyment. Very few camps work as hard as us to give you what we think you should have. If at any time one of our snowcone specialists do actually give you what you have asked for, please contact the management for a full replacement cone.
If you do have a dental plan you may mix your snowy delight with the other side. Contraptionists Fire Fries. With a Sauce we think you will like. if not someone else will.
 Check out our talks schedule in camp.
 2Kimmey's Boutique offers a wide variety of gently used Playa wear ! Come and discover a new burner outfit in the comfort of our Contraptionist Tent ! There is something for everyone !.

Not responsable for dental or diet issues.
Ice and potatoes may be unavailable if supplies are exhausted.
 But Please, Stop by anytime to enjoy our shade.
events.print_description: Come enjoy Our Afternoon Fire Fries and SnowCones Parties. Check our talks schedule and 2 Kimmies Boutique. Stop by anytime to enjoy our shade.

events.title: Orion's Epic Sword Battle
events.description: Orion is a six-year-old Burner who loves to sword fight!  BYO toy sword and join Orion and friends at the Man (6 o’clock side) for an epic battle.  Pirates, Jedi & Sith, fantasy and historical characters – all toy sword-bearers welcome!  KID FRIENDLY!  (A limited number of swords will be available for those arriving unarmed – come early!)
events.print_description: BYO toy sword and participate in an epic sword battle at the Man!  Kid-friendly!  (Some foam swords provided - come early to get one!)

events.title: 5th Annual International Beekeepers Summit!  >'='<
events.description: Beekeepers and wannabees come together for a hivemind discussion of all things bee.  Want to be a beekeeper but don’t know where to start?  Live in an urban area but have concerns about zoning &/or neighbors?  Have a theory on sustainable varroa mite management?  Opinions on which bee between the Italian, Carnolian, Russian, & Africanized bees make the best honey? Healthy Queen propagation and management?  How about a pollen patty recipe you want to share? We will discuss Beekeeping 101, suggest excellent reading materials, and who knows?  You may even have a little honey on your lips as you depart!  If a flock is to seagulls, what’s a group of beekeepers?  An argument!!!  (This summit does not require prior experience—we encourage wannabeekeepers to attend as there will be a lot of BuzzInn going on)!!!  Beek out with us!  Find us near the Do More Now's 7 story firehouse on 7:30 & Beeeeeee!
events.print_description: Beek out & join beekeepers from around the world to discuss the all things honeybee.  No previous experience necessary-learn to buzz anywhere! Bzzz!!!

events.title: String Cheese Incident Dance Party
events.description: After the Man falls, the Cheesers will congregate to listen to the best band on the planet, share tour stories, and enjoy the Cheesy good vibes!!  SCI swag exchange welcome!
events.print_description: After the Man falls, the Cheesers will congregate to listen to the best band on the planet, share tour stories, and enjoy the Cheesy good vibes!!

events.title: Preserving Wild Places or Extracting Resources
events.description: Can We Have Both? - Bruce Medhurst, Aquatic Biologist, will present an example from a nearby desert lake.
events.print_description: Can We Have Both? - Bruce Medhurst, Aquatic Biologist, will present an example from a nearby desert lake.

events.title: Eye See Astrology & Tea
events.description:
Come visit Eyes of the Soul and allow former professional make-up artist, Julie Klass, work on enhancing one of the most amazing elements the universe has ever created  ……… YOUR EYES. 
Often called the windows to your soul, we believe your eyes hold special meaning and represent so much of your inner beauty. We hope to enhance your unique eyes, and allow your inner beauty to shine through!
While Julie works on your eyes, we will complete an Astrology reading based on both your main Astrological sign and your Rising sign. We hope this will help you reflect a little more on who you are, and open yourself up to everything the universe has in store for you at Burning Man.
In addition to the make-up and Astrology readings, we will immerse you with a calming and reflective environment using natural wind chimes and aroma therapy. Based on some simple questions, we will try to assess your personal mood, tastes and physical needs. We will suggest some remedies using over (30) of the finest grade natural oils. We will suggest a combination of remedies that may include taste, touch and smell to help you rejuvenate.

You will also be served a relaxing organic herbal tea.

Eyes of the Soul wants you to feel even better than felt when you arrived. We are happy to send you out to the playa refreshed, rejuvenated, and better equipped to deal with the elements
events.print_description: Take a breather while we pamper you! Amazing eye enhancement, astrology reading, and organic herbal tea. We look forward to making you feel loved!

events.title: UNTITLED # 6
events.description: Untitled # 6 is a Quadrophonic, interactive audio installation that engages the community on four different levels: sight, sound, intellect and instinct, transforming the traditional, and often times, stagnant connection between art and spectator into an improvised relationship among of a collaborative group. It is this engagement that explores the process of making art. It envelops the spectator, forcing them to experience art on a level beyond contemplation, a level besieged by inspiration and driven by immediacy.? Step inside and see.
events.print_description: Untitled # 6 is a quadraphonic, interactive audio installation. Are you the one changing the sound with your movement? Step inside and see.

events.title: Transforming Loneliness
events.description: Learn how I transformed my life by finding the source of my loneliness and transforming it into new connections through new actions.  I will talk about what I have learned about loneliness and there there will be group sharing so everyone will get a chance to talk about their personal situation.

I AM ALEX" and start the conversation!! Bring drinks to share our AWESOMENESS!!!!

events.title: BiGGEST GATHERING of BURNERS with SOMBREROS
events.description: *Be part of BOTH the BiGGEST gathering of BURNERS witH SOMBREROS on Playa and take part in our funky BURNERS with SOMBREROS video... bring tequila and your AMiGOS!!! Arriba! Arriba!! It is an undeniable fact: there are more sombreros than Mexicans on Playa! As a Mexican I just get giddy happy when I see my fellow Burners with colorful sombreros throughout Playa.... it simply evokes the festive nature of my culture: fiesta, spirits, baile, canto and some good food! I want to take it a step further and challenge 'cultural appropriation' stigmas out there by making it a WIN-WIN situation here: If you wear a Sombrero on Playa, you gotta KiSS A MEXiCAN! Come celebrate in the BiGGEST GATHERiNG OF BURNERS with SOMBREROS at Center Camp Cafe. Bring your SOMBREROS, your TEQUILA, and your AMiGOS... and together we'll go in search of MEXiCANS ON PLAYA and share the LOVE!!! This year I am also gonna do something that IT'S SO OUT OF MY LEAGUE and make a ViDEO!!! SO come be part of the GIFT the GiVES and immortalize yourselves (and your SOMBRERO) in a funky video I got prepared for ya!! Arriba Arriba!! Come to Center Camp cafe and locate each other by, you got it, wearing a SOMBRERO!!! )'(
events.print_description: *ON Thing is true, there are more SOMBREROS than Mexicans on Playa. Let us show how much we appreciate Mexican Burners by honoring them with a PARTY!

events.title: Find Joy by Shifting your Thinking
events.description: I used to have a negative voice in my head criticizing my every choice. Learn how I changed my thinking by focusing on the positive in my life and taking new actions. Find joy and happiness by changing your thinking.  The class will include concrete examples from my life with group interaction so everyone gets a chance to share their story and get help.
events.print_description: How to change the negative voice in you head. Learn how I changed my thinking by focusing on the positive in my life and taking new actions.

events.title: !SPAGHETTIGEDON! Invasion of the Italians!
events.description:
Per la prima volta lo spaghettigeddon  atterra al burning  man! Tonnellate di pasta invaderanno il vostro pianeta, tenetevi pronti per l'apocalisse del gusto. ATTENZIONE! La zona verrà contaminata da olio extra vergine, aglio e peperoncino!
 "Evviva!  Spaghettigeddon lands in the dHive bar at  Burning Man for the first time, bringing tons of pasta cooked directly from a handful of alien chefs from PLANET AGLIO!  Get ready for an apocalypse of Renaissance tastes impossible to define.  Warning!  Abuse of extra virgin olive oil, garlic, and onion will put you into orbit! 
We Italibees are ready to engage any citizen of BRC with our jokes—because of our incomprehensible English be ready for a lot of hand gesturing communication while we vaporize you with flourishing flavor!!! Our mid-day lunch served to you may or may not include the following:  
*Carbonara of the Otherworld   
*Algio Oglio e Perperocino from Hell   
*Arrabbiata   
*Pesto of the Black Rocks   
Bring your own eating utensil, we will provide paper plates.  Find us at the dHive bar/BuzzInn in our village ‘Do More Now’ near the 7 story firehouse on 7:30 & B! 
 "The trouble with eating Italian food is that five or six days later, you're hungry again. " -- George Miller
events.print_description: We will try not to contaminate the area w/garlic & onion vapors from the pasta'sauce, but what better time to stop for a lunch like that?  Fuel up!

I will talk about all the things I have learned in the last year, and the approach to resiliency that I like the most and then we will open the class to interactive discussion.

events.title: NO Dimension Sufi Whirling Meditation
events.description: The SUFI whirling started in the heart of the desert, looking towards the infinity of the horizon. Standing still, connecting to the earth, and expanding our hands toward the universe, the SUFi begins to swirl joining the infinite movement of the planets. The participants will synchronize our movements, breath and heart beat to become conduits of this infinite energy that derives from the cosmos. In doing so, we become grounded amounts the chaos all around and reunite with the infinite energy within as we spread i it in all directions. WELCOME! Come stand still in time and watch the expansive SUFi whirling come from within!
events.print_description: Invoking dance & ritual to connect with the divine. Synchronizing our movements, breath & heart beat to become conduits of this Divinity.

events.title: The MoIST Maker Challenge
events.description: The MoIST Maker Challenge promotes creativity and innovation by challenging burners to identify a unique playa challenge, and design, build, and prototype a solution onsite that will solve the problem -- OR NOT -- instead, Challenge Participants can be matched with a MoIST Curator Coach who will support their mentee in writing an elegant, but not necessarily true or real solution, complete with history and detailed description, in the MoIST narrative style. The top three challenge submissions will become permanent MoIST exhibits and the winners will be honored at next year's Gala and FUN-raiser.

events.title: 48 Hour Film Project: Black Rock City
events.description:
Videogasm will again be host to The Black Rock City edition of The 48 Hour Film Project. Were groups of burners write, shoot and edit films over a 48 hour period to be shown at a festival on Thursday night. We'll start with a retrospective of short films produced at Burning Man in previous years and then premiere the shorts that will be produced at this years Burning Man!

Filmmakers: If you have a team and equipment, start at your leisure and follow the instructions on posters found at PlayaInfo and Videogasm (in Snowflake Village). If you're looking to form a team come to Videogasm at 3pm on Tuesday (8/30) to meet up with other like minded individuals. Film's should be under 10 minutes in length, contain the three ingredients (character, prop & line of dialog) listed on the posters mentioned above, and be brought to Videogasm by 8pm on Thursday (9/1). You can now shoot and edit a film on your smart phone, so get out there and make a film!
events.print_description: Burners make films over a 48 hour period here at BM! We'll start with a retrospective of films from previous years, then premiere this year's films!

events.title: MoIST Munchkin-Master-Crafter Station
events.description: A family-friendly lounge area, complete with kid-friendly refreshments and lots of tools and supplies. Families will be encouraged to make a (safe and controlled) mess while making mini solar-powered creations! At 12 noon, Tuesday-Thursday, our mini-MoTH/MoISTers will have the opportunity to showcase their solar-powered monsters, bugs, burning men, or whatever else our munchkin-master-crafters can imagine!
events.print_description: Family-friendly lounge area with kid-friendly refreshments, tools and supplies. Families create a mess while making mini solar-powered creations!

events.title: Creative Writing Jam
events.description: Come all you writers, all levels, to explore and enjoy your innate creative talent. Whether you're a rank amateur or a literary master, you've got talent. We know, because everybody does. We'll help prime your pump with warm-up prompts, free writing, poetry forms, Dadaist scores, surrealist techniques, and much more. Express yourself, memorialize your experiences on the playa, and share with others if you wish. Writing essentials will be provided, or bring your own.

events.title: Classical Concert at Sunset
events.description: Sunset, Wine, a blanket on the soft dust…and Live Classical music…what better way to start your evening!  BYO Blanket, BYO Wine, BYO Cheese, BYO Dessert, BYO date or friend…we provide the music and stage.  Reverbia's location on the Esplanade affords beautiful views of art and desert mountains…in a neighborhood where live music is respected by all thumping DJs…a place where you can actually hear the delicate of string and woodwind. This could be your chance to rekindle relationships, court a Burner for a first date, or just connect with good friends and family…perhaps even a sunset of self appreciation and silence...except for the music of Mozart and Debussy.  Enjoy your best wine…and maybe some light dinner along with that nice slice of Cheesecake you have been saving in the RV.  Manet's "Dejeuner sur l'Herbe"...BRC Sunset style!  Chamber music by Playa Pops members or TBA.

events.title: Leadership: The Four Faces of Incorruptible Power
events.description: In order to live in a world without war we must first heal the war between the sexes. It is time for feminine power and leadership to rise and join a healthy, incorruptible masculine. Where are the positive archetypes of feminine power? Kali, who cuts off your head? Hera, who is the god form of holly homemaker: basically “Zeus’ wife” with a goddess-sized jealous streak? Wonder Woman, who battles evil but has no family and no love in her life? It’s time for us to tell a new story of femininity, with our choices, with our self-expression, and with our lives. There are too few positive examples of women who are in full command of their sexuality and its attractive powers. There are too few healthy stories of women who’s full creative expression is unbridled and uncontrolled. There are too few healthy stories of men who are powerful without creating harm and violence .  There are too few healthy stories of men who create win-win instead of win-lose.  Learn how to harness the feminine forms and masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true manifestor - brining your highest vision into reality through your being, your words, and your actions.You will learn an unforgettable map of your own sources of power, some of which have been lying dormant for your entire life. Once you can locate and allow all four faces of incorruptible power to move through you, you can lead, inspire, and serve almost anyone. For Men and Women who want to bring their full spiritual presence into the material world and be the bridge between our present reality and the future vision only you can see.
events.print_description: Learn how to harness the feminine forms and masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true integrated leader, & serve anyone

events.title: Mad Sorcerer's Workshop
events.description:
Do you like Burning Man?  Do you like shiny lights?  Do you like play-doh?  We thought so.  This year, the NY Regional is combining all three, for the ultimate Midway interactive art trifecta at Burning Man.  

Each visitor to the Mad Sorcerer's Workshop creates one tiny clay creature and adds it to the world growing on the shelves of an infinity box.  Visitors are encouraged to interact with each other, to cooperate, and to let their imaginations roam, molding polka dot trees, green cows, castles, dinosaurs, and UFOs.  Make a blue fish, your friend can make a red bird, the next person will make a small man, together we'll have the beginnings of a whole new world, with the reflections of the infinity box making it look like there's whole schools and flocks of strange creatures and a crowd of people, all interacting.

You get to be the Mad Sorcerer, create whole worlds in your crystal ball, just to mess with them.  You get to say how creative and lovely your pet world will be.  There's no skill required, no creation too boring or too creative.  A red, and yellow and purple castle?  Yes!  A small brown snake?  Yes!  Every play-doh creature has a place with us.

Want to see how the project is going?  Want to Contribute and Volunteer? Like us at https://www.facebook.com/Mad-Sorcerer-1698581610391522/ for project updates and event announcements. 

Open 24-7, for kids of all ages, shade, play-doh and infinity box worlds provided.
events.print_description: Craft colorful new worlds with the sorcery of play-doh and the transfiguration of mirrors.  Open 24-7 for children ages 2-102, materials provided.
events.other_location: We're a Guild Workshop at the Base of the Man

events.title: Planetary Peace Project - Sacred Theater Ritual
events.description:
Calling all visionaries, healers and change makers.  Join us for the Planetary Peace Project's Sacred Theater Ritual at  Burning Man's largest structure, The Catacombs where we will be Opening the Portal to Planetary Peace.  Friends, the time is upon us. Drawing on the profound energy of the playa, we will presence the sacred dream of planetary peace knowing this is not only possible - it is the only way forward for humankind. It is time to claim this dream and bring it into our bodies, our lives, and our Earth.

Meet us at The Catacombs & 10 o'clock to co-create a Sacred Theater Ritual that will take place deep within the Catacombs and within ourselves. Together we will call forth forgiveness, personal healing, and embodied peace.  Bring your creativity and playfulness. Wear white if you can. Bring singing bowls, bells, gongs and your desire to co-create planetary peace through one of the largest sacred theater rituals on the planet.
events.print_description: Opening the Portal to Planetary Peace, together we will call forth forgiveness, personal healing,  and embodied peace. It's time! Bring bells & gongs.

events.title: Happy Feet Beats and Ecstatic Dance Party

Afterward the Green Goddess will offer an "open-house" style happy hour in the lounge (BYOC) with music/yoga and ecstatic dancing, music provided by resident GG DJ. We will have a list of the week's Green Goddess Events/ classes posted for all to see.

events.print_description: Join us for "shots" of Kombucha or Water Kefir, along with fresh sauerkraut and sprouted seed crackers (BYO Plate & Fork if desired)

events.title: Soul Story Circle: Claiming Your Personal Myth
events.description:
If you are a fan of Joseph Campbell, Jean Houston, Clarissa Pikola Estes...this will be right up your alley. 

This is a live storytelling event where together, we explore the mythic landscape that is living in our unconscious. Through the combination of exploring the symbols, archetypes, metaphors that show up in the one of a kind story created in our time together, you are provided context and tools to explore the power and potential of your story and how to use it to access and embody the parts of you that may be lying dormant. People have requested stories that will heal, provide insight about their gifts, and help them access their personal power. 

What to expect from A Soul Story Circle: When we gather in a circle, one person is chosen to receive a story that will serve all. We then go through a process called talking back to the story, where we make sense of the symbols, metaphors, and archytpes that presented and how they apply to our every day lives.
events.print_description: Explore the mythic landscape that is living in our unconscious through the exploration of the the symbols, archetypes, metaphors.

events.title: Happy Belly! Learning to Eat Well on the Playa
events.description:
Join us in the Green Goddess Lounge on Wednesday afternoon, where we will offer fellow burners the opportunity to learn more about eating well and staying nourished on the playa.  Learn about the benefits of probiotic foods, including how to make them for yourself at home!
        The Green Goddess resident Nutritionist/Registered Dietitian, Sunsoul; will talk about the benefits of incorporating probiotic foods and beverages (like those we serve) on the playa and into your everyday diet, along with answering questions from fellow campers.
        During class, participants will also have the chance to talk with professional medicinal horticulturists -who will share tips for making your own probiotic foods and drinks at home.
events.print_description: Learn about eating well and staying nourished on the playa; including the benefits of probiotic foods & tips for making them for yourself at home!

events.title: To Snip is Sexy
events.description:
Men, be brave and responsible. Be desired. Being sterile is the new sexy and it won't diminish your maleness or performance in any way. Getting snipped will make you more desirable. Hear what the procedure is like, what happens after, and hear from women admire men who take responsibility for the ultimate birth control procedure. 

Humans are the source cause and the planet cannot sustain us if we continue to overpopulate. No longer should women suffer so much of the birth control responsibility. It is time for men to step up and snip it.
events.print_description: It's time to lift the birth control burden from women. Learn how sexy and liberating it can be when men disappear their sperm burden.

events.title: The Wiggle Room
events.description: Join us for The Wiggle Room, where we turn up the volume and dance just simply because it is our favorite thing to do! Inspired by Ecstatic Dance, The Wiggle Room is a safe, non-verbal space to dance any way you like so long as you wear your heart on your sleeve. Our DJ will provide an eclectic mix of dance music, starting with a half hour warm-up and followed by a one-hour dance party in the sunshine. Come join us for some good ol' fashioned dancing on the playa! Wiggle on!
events.print_description: Lovers of dance unite! We have one hour to let it all out and wiggle to our heart’s content. Speak through movement, pay homage to the dance gods.

events.title: Pastie Making Workshop
events.description: Camp Dark Sparkle can't wait to once again share our pastie expertise with our playa-mates! We set up stations where you assemble and then decorate your intimate flair. We provide all materials and instruction whenever you need/want it. We also love to give out tips about how to twirl those tassels. This workshop always attracts a good crowd so please leave enough time so you don't rush your Dark Sparkle!
events.print_description: Come design and create your very own pasties and learn to twirl those tassels! Guaranteed to be titillating for all. All materials provided.

events.title: Burlesque Extravaganza
events.description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what pushes people to the point of insanity; that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. It is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that citizens of BRC embrace. Our shows are an opportunity for Dark Sparklers and other BRC citizens to explore and showcase their Dark Sparkle through performance, storytelling, and tease. Featuring your favorite DS performers as well as guests from the BRC community. We'll also turn the tables with ample opportunity for participation.
events.print_description: An exploration through performance, storytelling, and tease, featuring DS performers and guests from the BRC community with ample opportunity for part

events.title: Intimate Dungeon Portraits
events.description:
Come with your favorite Top or Bottom, and pose in our dungeon. We'll provide St. Andrew's cross, stockade, restraints, floggers, whips, and paddles. Not comfortable posing. No worries, the Posing Wheel-of-Karma will have you posing like a Citadel porn-star.

Come alone, with a friend, or bring all your whole camp. It’s free, it’s intimate, and it’s confidential. All final photos will be delivered to you via emailed link to a secure folder.
events.print_description: Come with your Top/Bottom and pose in our dungeon. We'll provide St. Andrew's cross, stockade, restraints, floggers, and whips. Confidential photos.

events.title: Rainy Days
events.description: We invite citizens to enjoy relaxing and refreshing moments when the sun is high over Black Rock City.  The sound of raindrops dripping on a tropical forest, chirping birds and Lavender-mist will cool you down. Get cozy in the hammocks and pillow islands of our ConnecDome and enter conversations with fellow burners
events.print_description: Refresh with Lavender-mist, chirping birds and raindrops dripping in a tropical forest while getting cozy in our hammocks and pillow islands.

events.title: WE: Web of experiences
events.description: The WEB OF EXPERIENCES (WE) is a web of ropes and light strings that invites all passers-by to share a piece of themselves--knowledge, art, thoughts, or an experience. All passers-by and visitors will feel inspired (and be asked) to contribute to WE by writing, drawing or creating on individual (cloth grommet-lined moop-proof) flags which will be attached to WE. Throughout the week, WE will organically grow and participants can walk amongst and be inspired by this hanging garden that signifies BRC’s collective, shared wisdom. Some pieces in WE will be written in mirror cursive, a homage to Da Vinci’s notebooks--we will provide pocket mirrors to decipher their meaning.
events.print_description: Add piece of yourself to BRCs collective mind: share your passions, hopes, reflections, experiences in this interactive art installation

events.title: Tea Ceremony
events.description: Numerous cultures have found communion and solace in the experience of drinking tea. Brewing tea assumes a meditative posture and is inherently generous. Rooted in these philosophies, we will bring strangers together through a tea ceremony grounded in calmness and mindfulness. The significance and ritual of each ceremony will be explained by our in-house tea-master. We will teach participants, in pairs, how to brew tea and conduct a formal tea ceremony specific to an individual culture (Chinese, Indian, Japanese, Russian, African, English, Turkish), which they will then perform and share with the rest of the group.
events.print_description: Cultivate calmness and mindfulness through the ancient art of brewing, serving and enjoying tea in our formal tea ceremony.

events.title: CHAMPAGNE & LINGERIE SUNSET PARTY
events.description: Back by popular demand, we are pleased to announce the 2016 Champagne Chandeliers Lingerie Party! A lingerie dance-party where we offer ice-cold Champagne and where DJ Yaz and our dusty brethren from Camp DeMentha will provide sensual deep-house beats under our six gorgeous chandeliers. Our friends from the Arabian Nights mutant vehicle will expand our party into the streets, connecting to our sound system and adding the flair of 1001 nights. The plush decor under our Dome is only matched in sensuality by the black lingerie adoring the skin of our Bacchanalian revelers. We will dance from dusk until the champagne runs dry and the Playa draws our Bacchants off into the sensual night.
events.print_description: Join our main event: a sensual black-lingerie dance-party under our gorgeous chandeliers until the champagne runs dry!

events.title: A Romantic Evening in Pepperland
events.description: Chat, dance, lounge, and refresh in our unique atmosphere. Our chanteuse will play beautiful background love songs and melodies (mostly original) during your romantic evening affair. “Her voice and music are the perfect vehicles for all these strong words and emotions…. It is intelligent, full of beauty, humanity, sensibility, of romanticism…
events.print_description: Chat/dance/lounge/refresh in our unique atmosphere. Our chanteuse plays beautiful background love songs 4 you/yours during a romantic evening affair.

events.title: Latin Party
events.description: Our hot Latin Party is all about expressing ourselves and pura vida! The Latin American culture is a colorful mix of races, traditions and expressions that have evolved over the years, all bound by a common love for music and dancing.  We will share this connection by combining different styles of music, such as Cumbia Villera (Chile/Argentina), Bachata (Colombia), Axe (Brazil), and Merengue (Dominican Republic), in one unique dancing event (Latin music is not just about Salsa!).   Our two “Maestros” will teach essential dance moves for each style… while enforcing the Latin proverb: Nobody cares how you dance, just do it with passion!  This event will bring to life the deep connection that defines the Latin culture.
events.print_description: Learn Cumbia, Bachata, Merengue in one unique dancing event featuring the Margarita-Bike! Nobody cares how you dance, just do it with passion!

events.title: Have A Hootenanny On Us!
events.description: The whole family is invited for this fine, frolicking sing-along, from the very young to the very old. Our leader will be singing, and you’ll soon be singing, too! Smiles and laughter all around are guaranteed. Endorphins will flow freely! Light refreshments will be available.
events.print_description: The whole family is invited for this great sing-along, from the very young to very old. Our leader sings, and you’ll soon be singing, too! Endorphins!

events.title: There Can Be Only One
events.description: In this talk, a community development expert weaves a shocking narrative. The discussion will explore and contrast various uses of federal land that illustrate the extent of exploitation against activities such as Burning Man. Attempts to quell the event have only made it stronger by removing the possibility for a similar manifestation.
events.print_description: A talk that catalogues the intentional and accidental forces that ensure there will never be anything else like Burning Man.

events.title: Cartooning & Rock Painting: 2 Ways to Rock Worlds
events.description:
* Cartooning is a powerful art-form that can entertain and influence, but is simple to learn and accessible to all.  Rock painting is a fun, relaxing, and enjoyable pastime. Wed, Sat: 2-4PM.
Come learn from a professional cartoonist to practice this expressive and enjoyable skill.  All skill levels welcome; you do not need to have any prior training or experience.  Learn all the basic skills like character creation, layout, composition, perspective, and comedy writing.  Brush up on advanced techniques like human and animal figure drawing, proportion, and color.  We end with an improvisational art game using the cartooning skills we've learned.  Supplies provided, or bring your own.
* Forged out of the eons of Deep Time and raw forces of Nature, a uniquely shaped and smoothed river stone awaits your unique curiosity in an ephemeral moment of creative exploration. We supply you with the stone, paint and guidance; you supply your awareness, vision, and imagination. Together on your planetary journeys, after 4.5 billion years you and the river stone meet. Silly or profound, the colors or imagery are all a part of the play on the Playa. Will your rock become a bug, a power object, a flower, or a psychedelic paisley? Experienced art teachers can help with color mixing, brush technique, and concept execution. Create a memory to keep or offer as a gift. Thurs: 3-5PM.
events.print_description: Do either or both! Learn & enjoy expressive skills: any level. It’s play. Basic or advanced techniques of powerful/fun art. Cartoon: W,Sa; Rocks: Th.

events.title: Deep Thoughts Deep Playa
events.description:
Experience ambient sounds and etheral words at this live Deep Playa experience. Singers serenade, poets pander prose, deep thoughts abound. 

Performing artists interested in participating contact Zerodrome to be added to the venue. Interested in ambient tunes and smooth, mind expanding voices and speech appropriate to the solace of the Deep Playa. Ambient drummers also welcome.

 Navigating to the event: 
 Go to the Man, line up the temple to know where 12:00 is. Line up 1:00 and commute to the fence. Look for the Road Cone Mutant Vehicle. Or...go to the fence and follow it until you wander into the 1:00 area.
events.print_description: Experience ambient sounds and ethereal words at this live Deep Playa experience. Singers serenade, poets pander prose, deep thoughts abound.
events.other_location: 1:00 and the Fence in the deep playa

events.title: Crossroads Live Music: Gender Bender
events.description: Get down to the best live music on the playa with Crossroads' 20-piece band, scandalously sexy burlesque dancers, filthy bottomless cocktails, and grilled cheese sandwiches. Tonight's theme - Gender Twisted - Girls who are Boys who like Boys to be Girls. The best of musical androgyny is celebrated Annie Lennox to the Purple One, we'll be blurring those lines! Get your trans-cendental tune fix afterwards with DJ Olly.
events.print_description: The best live music party on the playa! Booze, broads, a 20 piece band! Tonight: musical androgyny, Annie Lennox to the Purple One: blur those lines!

events.title: Intergalactic Pancake Massacre
events.description: Pancakes on the playa! Pile yours high with heavenly berries and orbit the Star Bar for Bloody Marys. Art, acting, and poetry while you wait. Our piping-hot cakes come crammed with chocolate chips, cranberries, blueberries, or all of the above, and can be finished with a huge selection of toppings (fresh fruit at the beginning of the week, as well as options including peanut butter, jam, nutella, maple syrup, honey etc). Meanwhile, our camp watering hole, the Star Bar, will serve copious quantities of Bloody Marys, Screwdrivers, and Pina Coladas. Our campers showcase their creative passions while you wait: "adult" coloring books, improv acting sessions, and free-form poetry. Express yourself!

Tuesday 7/30
10-11:30am
Universe University presents:
"Exploring Connections" a level 1 ACROVINYASA™ class with Eudaimonia Yoga
Broaden the understanding and connection of self with this dynamic practice. Jordan Goff and Antonella Zabaglio will lead you into a self aware and conscious place with a solo practice, then join forces with your new yogi friends as we take poses from earth to air in this practice of trust and community. No yoga experience or partner required, just bring an open mind and playful heart!

events.title: Playa Name Ceremony - Anoint Thy Name
events.description:
Humans are creatures of ritual. The Burning of the Man is a ritual. The lighting of the lamps is a ritual. Building and visiting the temple is a ritual for many. Playa names are a ritual. What's been missing is a ritual that recognizes and honors playa names. 

Have a playa name? Embrace the rite of passage. It is never too late. 

Don't have a playa name? Find any veteran of ten burns and request to spend time with them so they may divine a name that suits you. Or stop by Zerodrome days before this event for assistance from one of our sages.

Standing among peers, be acknowledged and born again as a child of the Burn. The Grand Zero of Black Rock leads the ceremony, summoning and channeling the eternal energies that bind atoms throughout the universe. Swell with the pride of legitimacy through this rite of passage.

Look for the Road Cone near the Identity Reorganization Portal
events.print_description: Just as burning of the Man is ritual, we honor your playa name accordingly. Take the rite of passage to legitimize the name by which Burners know you.

events.title: Button Up!
events.description:
Missing from the printed manual so write us down and tell your friends!

You know those 2-inch, round lapel pins often used for political candidates and such? Ever wanted to make one with your own design? Well we’d love to help you realize that dream!

Button UP! camp has events on Tues and Thurs from 2-4pm, when you can come draw your own design or bring a small image you’ve printed (must be paper), and stamp it onto a pin.

We love having people come by, grab a drink, make a pin and stay for a chat so please put us on your calendar and come for a visit!

events.title: Let's Talk Gibberish
events.description: Speaking gibberish is an act of artistic improvisation in which the filter of the ego is relinquished as we open our hearts to authentic expression beyond the bounds of language. We will explore the beauty of raw vocal vibration and its potential for connection beyond pre-established templates of meaning. Y'all know we don't really communicate through words, anyways!
events.print_description: Come connect in authentic conversation...without words! Your heart cannot be contained within the finite resources of conventional vocabulary.

events.title: Trust Your Intuition with Qoya
events.description:
"There a million choices on the playa (and in life). Learn how to never fear you're making the wrong choice because you know how to navigate your path by trusting what feels right in your body.
 
 Qoya is based on the idea that through movement we remember. We remember our essence is wise, wild and free. Wise, wild and free also draw reference to the movement forms we practice. Wise- calling on the wisdom traditions of yoga. Wild- the creative expression in dance. Free- expanding our capacity to enjoy our bodies through more feminine and flowing movement. In Qoya there is no way you can do it wrong, and the way you know you are doing it right is that it feels good."
events.print_description: What would your life feel like if you trusted yourself? Explore that feeling through movement, community, ritual & a pilgrimage to this offering.

We'll begin this sensuous massage with multiple hands imitating light raindrops on our bodies. Starting out with light tapping on the receiver's body, leading into patting the body then gently laying hands on the body, ending with another round of light tapping. Feel the chi emanating off the energy body! If there is time and interest, we can move into a freeform touch expression of your own creation!
events.print_description: How do you want to be touched? Many hands imitate raindrops on our bodies, followed by freeform touch expression of your own creation!

"Learn how to access the infinite universe behind the eyes. Your extra-sensory perception. In this interactive class, you will be introduced to some basic psychic tools that will help you to access your innate wisdoms. 
 
 In this interactive class we will learn how to:
 
 • “Ground” our energy in order to increase our focus, and connection with the earth
 • Auras - define our aura and energetic boundaries
 • Psychic Screen- Gain access to our own intentions and sub-conscious information
 
 We will end with a powerful group healing."

events.title: Expansion of Love through Human Connection
events.description:
Use the power of platonic (non-sexual) touch to transmute sexual energy into spiritual power – Pure Love.

"When yin and yang (or masculine and feminine) come together, it produces energy. Often, that energy is sexually directed. Combustion happens, but usually from the loins. This is part of our “animal / darwinian” nature. Nothing wrong with it per se – it is part of who we are. It is how the human race continues. 
 
 And, we are more.
 
 This powerful energy can also be directed up and through the heart. And when it is, that force of energy has the power to soften the heart and break through walls we may have built up around it (fear, resentment, grudges, and other things that keep us from feeling our own Divinity). If the heart is open and cleansed, energy can move into that space. When it does, it creates a pleasure that makes sex seem rather mundane. The energy gets transmuted into spiritual power and ecstasy – Pure Love.
 
 In this workshop, we will use the power of yin and yang, platonic (non-sexual) touch and loving friendship to soften, expand and ignite the heart with Pure Love.
 
 Using the Light of our eyes and the Energy that moves through our hands and hearts we will connect with each other, swim in Love and glorify the Divinity within our hearts."
events.print_description: Use the power of platonic (non-sexual) touch to transmute sexual energy into spiritual power – Pure Love.

events.title: NOODLEPOCALYPSE
events.description:
It's the NOODLEPOCALYPSE. 

It's cold, filthy, and far from home out there. There may be wolves, or people dressed like wolves, or a screaming metal monster than someone once called a wolf before science happened to it! No matter, what you need is safety, light, and food! We've got yer back!

Get'cher hot, salty, broth and noodles. We'll have 'em till we don't, you'll slurp 'em down till they're gone. And hey-ho-diddley-hey chuckles, they ain't from no styrofoam cup. Come on down to flavor country, and ride the noodle! (No actual rides present at camp, just noodles...please don't try and ride your noodles, that would just be awkward, and probably messy)

AND BEFORE YOU ASK:
No, they're not gluten free, they're frikkin noodles.
No, they're not vegan. Stop asking. We're not that kind of noodle.
There probably won't be any pandas, geese, or other assorted whimsical creatures unless you bring them yourself.
events.print_description: Get'cher hot, salty, broth and noodles. We'll have 'em till we don't, and they ain't from no styrofoam cup. No, Not vegan, where do you think you are?

events.title: Stardust Chapel: Playa Weddings!
events.description: Welcome to the Chapel of Love at the Stardust Lounge! We will be open daily for drop-in weddings between Monday, 8/29, and Saturday, 9/3. Our hours are noon -- 6pm (sunset) and by appointment. Experience the wonders of our magical gazebo where visitors of all genders can partake of the joy of matrimony in a (non-legally-binding) ritual. Elvis, Drunk Elvis, or Mr. Stardust might serenade you as our beautiful showgirls celebrate your nuptials in Vegas fashion. Not sure what kind of Playa wedding you want? Spin the Wedding Roulette wheel and find out! Need your Playa wedding annulled? We'll do that too! Don't forget to take a commemorative photo in our fabulous "head in hole" wedding cutouts before you leave. Note: please feel free to contact us if you want to schedule a special ceremony outside our "regular" daytime hours. We're here for you!

events.title: TRUTH OR DARE JENGA
events.description:
Our version of the popular Jenga game. Only our version is a little more fun & naughty. 

Our 4ft tall large scale Jenga game consists of 54 precision-crafted, specially finished hard wood blocks with special adult call to action instruction on each.. Stack all of the blocks in levels of three placed next to each other along their long sides and at a right angle to the previous level. As the participant extracts a piece they need then action the instruction they selected.

Pay us a visit, get sweaty on the dance floor, and take the reinvented you out on playa to see what surprises the night has in store!

Hit up our Detox-Retox station to detox some of your internal physical baggage. There are lots of ways to embrace and enact a new you today. Get your groove on, embrace your inner joy, and remember why you came out into the dust.

events.title: Monkey Wrench Station
events.description:
Bike broken and nowhere to turn?  Well, you may be 'all thumbs' but if at least two are opposable, we can help you fix it!  (And if not, we'll help you break it altogether!)  Here at Simian Akademy, our mission is to help you gain the skills necessary to adapt to today's dynamic, ever-changing playa environment.  Our dedicated team of trained monkeys will show you where it goes and how to work it.  If a trained monkey can do it, you can too!  

Come spin the 'Wheel of Fortune' to decide your fate:  Fix It, Break It, Camp Chore, Sparkle Pony Watering Trough, Dome of Despair... only the hand of Fate knows the outcome.
events.print_description: Bike broken and nowhere to turn?  Well, you may be 'all thumbs' but if at least two are opposable, we can help you fix it!

events.title: Graffiti Tent Corner

events.title: Grateful Dyed Tie Dye workshop
events.description: Come to Buscamp and enjoy Moop free tie dye.  Bring something natural fibre to tie dye.  We have all the supplies you need.  We have helpers to assist you with your designing.  We send you off with your creation in a zip lock bag to rinse out at home along with the soap you need.  Enjoy the work shop, some grateful dead music and spend some time in the Leopard Lounge while your creation soaks in the soda ash bath... Peace
events.print_description: Bring something 100% natural fibre to Tie Dye. Then enjoy some time in the leopard Lounge and Spa. we supply the dyes and supplies. Moop free workshop

events.title: Camp Delicioso & Creperie
events.description: Camp Delicioso cranks up the stoves and tasty tunes around 9am, filling the air with sweet smells of freshly made crepes!  Lead by a variety of chefs from all over the world, our “staff” man a full-service kitchen and begin mixing, flipping and stuffing a range of sweet and savory crepes for our fellow burners.  Serving WTF 9ish - noonish, please come on down and start your day off right!

events.title: Captain Scurvy’s Shanty Grog-along
events.description: We provide grog and sea shanties, and lead and encourage others to lead group singing. We will have the main event in our camp then encourage roving about the neighborhood and gifting ye ol' fellow Burners with a clever tune (guerilla shantying).
events.print_description: Bring your own shanties to lead, or follow along with our traditional and playafied sea-faring songs.  We’ll have plenty of grog in the jar!

events.title: Deafening Sensations!
events.description: Blink on this! Light up your night with reactive art sensors that tune in to your every move and vibration! Step into a place where thoughts can travel through space. Look us in the eyes too long and you may fall in love or hallucinate. Your untapped powers of sight and touch will lead the way! We will bestow upon you a new name when you leave! All ages, abilities, and bodies welcome!
events.print_description: Light up with reactive art that reads your every move! Look us in the eyes too long and hallucinate! Your powers of sight and touch will lead the way!

events.title: Davinci Dust Run
events.description:
1st Inaugural Trash Fence Perimeter Run 
50K too long?  5K too short?  Perimeter Run, just RIGHT!  Join us for the 9+ miles of unexplored Burning Man landscape in the shape of a pentagon in which Vitruvian Man stands tall.  Davinci Screwdrivers to quench your thirst after the run, and of course a water station along the course.
events.print_description: Join us for the 9+ miles of unexplored trash fence perimeter. Davinci screwdrivers to quench your thirst after the run, water station en-route.

events.title: BRC Municipal Airport Pancake Breafast
events.description:
88NV
Airport Pancake Breakfast
Thursday,  8:30 am until the pancakes run out.

Come one, come all....  to a Black Rock City Municipal Airport Tradition, the Thursday morning pancake breakfast.   
We'll have cakes on the griddle at 8:30 am, and serve em' up hot til they're gone!
Wear your favorite pilot outfit, airline garb, or most beautiful wings.....and fly to the front of the line!
Bring your own plate, cup and utensils if you can.
Travel out the 5:00 road, past the circle streets to the perimeter fence.
We look forward to sharing 88NV-Black Rock City Municipal Airport with you, where we really do.... Fly The Playa!
Pancakes n' Playa Dust, with a side of Airplanes!
events.print_description: Wear your favorite pilot outfit, airline garb, or most beautiful wings.....and fly to the front of the line!

events.title: The Lighter Side of Spanking
events.description:
Turned on by spanking (or want to be)? Soft or hard, clothed or not, your new techniques will quickly become a party favorite and have people lining up for their turn. In this Hands On workshop, Spanking Maestro BamBam and his assistant SaraBee review the three critical components to guaranteed to leave them begging for more: the warm-up, the follow through, and the rub out. Not necessary to bring your own paddle. Starts at SUNSET! (7:30 pm)
LOCATION:
Transformation Station Village
6:15 & Guild
Black Rock City
events.print_description: Turned on by spanking (or want to be)? Learn the 3 critical components to this Party Favorite in Hands On Workshop led by experts Bambam & SaraBee.

events.title: Koulu School

events.title: The Olfactorium
events.description: Burdened with useless swag?  How about something useful?  Stop by the Olfactorium and have a custom perfume created just for you by professional perfumer, Agent 11.  Scent evokes memories directly through the limbic system in a way no mere memento ever could.  You will leave with a mini perfume that is tailored to your tastes—something you can take back to the default world as an everyday reminder of your experiences at Burning Man.
events.print_description: Come to the Olfactorium for a custom perfume created just for you by our Mistress of Scent, Agent 11, so your beautiful burner-self will smell great!

events.title: CHILL THE FUCK OUT and COLOR!
events.description: Feeling cranky from the heat?  Your new best friend getting on your nerves already?  You need to CHILL THE FUCK OUT and COLOR!  Come visit our shaded dome to relax and color your frustrations away.  Choose your favorite, beautifully embellished swear word, or perhaps a picture of unicorns being total jerks!
events.print_description: Feeling cranky from the heat? CHILL THE FUCK OUT and COLOR! Choose your favorite, beautifully embellished swear word and color your frustrations away.

events.title: Figure Drawing at Art Model Camp
events.description:
The Art Model camp provides a shaded place to do figure drawing, and/or pose for drawings, no experience necessary for either.  Male and female models, 2-20 minute poses in 30 minute sessions, with some artist supplies available (sketch pads and pencils, charcoal).

Noon to 3 pm Monday through Sunday, with a bar of sorts.

We're located in the outer edge of he AEZ camp (our camp #TBD, should be on the G side at 4:00 - look for the dome and 20x20 shade structure).
events.print_description: A place for figure drawing/posing (no exp nec).  M/F models, 2-20 min poses in 30 min sessions, some supplies available. With a bar, of course.

events.title: Orgy Dome - A playa tradition since 2003
events.description: Need a safe, cool place to get it on? Cum to "And Then There's Only Love" for our world famous, air conditioned Orgy Dome. The Orgy Dome is an inclusionary and exploratory environment where couples and moresomes can love and be loved. Enthusiastic consent is practiced throughout the Orgy Dome. Monogamous or polyamorous - The Orgy Dome has something for everyone with “Just Us” and “Open to More” areas. Our Orgy Dome is fully equipped for lovers to play day or night with massage tables, mattresses, sheets, couches, & supplies. (Bringing a towel/sheet and safer sex supplies is appreciated but not necessary.) ** Open to couples and moresomes 18+ of all genders and preferences. Open 4:00pm to dawn.
events.print_description: The Orgy Dome is the original, air conditioned, consensual play space for couples and moresomes of all genders and preferences. Open 4pm to dawn.

events.title: Vinnie Da Vinci and Uncle Leo's Inventions
events.description: Vinnie DaVinci will be with us this year and he will discuss some of his Uncle Loe’s inventions. Many people don’t know a lot about all of the things Leo came up with. Like the coil spring (slinky), false teeth (chattering), sticks and discs for building (tinker toys), ornithopter and bicycle. Each of these will be there so all can enjoy a ride on the bicycle and the feel of a coil spring in their hands.
events.print_description: Vinnie DaVinci will be with us and he will discuss some of his Uncle Loe’s inventions. Many people don’t know about all of the things Leo invented.

events.title: Zipline
events.description:
Just off of Esplanade, after a death-defying climb up more than fifty feet of chain ladder, watch as someone in a tutu and a cowboy hat clips you into a safety harness and then sends you plummeting in a terrifying freefall directly towards the playa below.

Welcome to the Sextant zipline.
events.print_description: A thrilling ride from the top of our 70ft tower out more than 1200 feet onto playa.

events.description: A longtime favorite as I believe the radioactive tester will have an extra something fully grown by then and we never know what their skin color will be.

events.title: More Carrot - Black Rock City Farmers Market
events.description: One of the best parts of exploring any city is checking out the farmer’s market- and Black Rock City is no exception! At More Carrot Farmer’s Market you can nourish yourself and your crew on a wide array of fresh fruits and vegetables sourced from local farms on the outskirts of Reno and Sparks. Come eat your fill of the foods your ancestral human family has been enjoying for millions of years!
events.print_description: Black Rock City Farmers Market: Enjoy tasty, fresh produce in the French Quarter Village to feed the body, refresh the spirit, and nourish the soul!

events.title: Countless Carrot March
events.description: JOIN the More Carrot Camp and march on Thursday September 1st to protect The Man from the Ravenous Bunny Hordes! It's time to claim our rights and the rights of all veggie-kind to be treated as the sentient beings we are. All Carrots and Allies assemble in your finest green and orange attire for a pre-party from 4pm-6pm at the 4:30 Portal in the French Quarter before the Billion Bunny March. In true Carrot fashion, we’ll provide drinks, music and much entertainment before we head out to intercept the bunnies at 6pm sharp! Bring along your singing voice and your best vegetable themed cocktails to share. While pro carrot, we're certainly a vegetable-friendly group. Practice your chants, learn some Carrot songs (http://goo.gl/IpyjQ) and, most importantly, join us as our wave of orange and green goodness spreads across the playa!
events.print_description: JOIN the More Carrot Camp and march on to protect The Man from the Ravenous Bunny Hordes!  Meet @ French Quarter for pre-party and organizing.

events.title: NOODLEPOCALYPSE #2!
events.description:
It's the ReNoodlification! 

In the end times, the noodles shall save us, the noodles shall give us life, the noodles shall be our guide! An earlier, second, noodle extravaganza for those who aren't as night-owley, or possibly younger than others. Noodles dispensed with glee and abandon! Bad jokes! Pink monkeys!

Get'cher tasty noodles. We'll have 'em till we don't, you'll slurp 'em down till they're gone. Delicious noodles, yummy hot dog pieces, everything you need for evening fun!

AND BEFORE YOU ASK:
Not gluten free, not vegan. Seriously, stop asking, the hot dogs should be a dead giveaway.
Also, there probably won't be any pandas, geese, or other assorted whimsical creatures unless you bring them yourself.
events.print_description: Get'cher hot, salty, broth and noodles. It's a kid friendly 2nd Noodle Fest! We'll have 'em till we don't. No, Not vegan, look for the hot dogs!!

events.title: Huge BBQ NaMeatStay with Meat Communion
events.description: BBQ NaMeatStay with Meat Communion (previously Burning Beef and Bison BBQ): THE camp signature event! We BBQ over 180+lbs of beef (Tri Tip) to serve 650+ people over a 4-5 hour period. We have passed Health and Safety for the past 3 years since going public. We are proud of this event and the organizers have successfully BBQ’d on the Playa for 7 consecutive years. You want our meat in your mouth then get on your knees. True to form, we have an meat alter where you can confess your deepest darkest sins to our resident Meat Priest & Naughty Nun. New this year is our Glory Glory Hallelujah Meat hole. Come and join us for our intimate confessionals and give meat communion

events.title: Make-Your-Own Party Pole Party
events.description: Meet your party pole spirit animal, put em on a stick, discover 2nd level dance parties, get sweaty, bubbles!!!  Come to Corny's Party Pole Palace and create the party pole of your dreams at one of our party pole creation stations, then shake your butt on the party pole dance floor.  Already have a party pole....bring it down so it can make some new party pole friends!  Take a pic in our photo-booth to capture the moment and ride off with your new party pole friend.  Make sure to feed your party pole often, it only eats dance and it's hungry all the time!
